string.name: name
string.value: 太公对老婆的爱
去水世界寻找在船上钓鱼的太公。
在小船上钓鱼的太公拜托我收集他老婆爱吃的#t4000166#。替太公收集到#b#t4000166# 20个#k之后送给住在童话村的太公夫人#b莲婆婆#k。\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k / 20
受小船上钓鱼的太公之托，收集到#t4000166# 20个送给了他的老婆莲婆婆。莲婆婆觉得我这样帮他们实在是让她过意不去，为了表示对我的谢意，告诉我若需要瓮的话可以随时来找她。

string.name: name
string.value: 兄弟俩的稻米搬运1

string.name: parent
string.value: 感情深厚的两兄弟
去找住在童话村的七诚。
住在童话村的七诚和七南是两兄弟。七诚说弟弟七南的粮食好像不够，托我把自家的一堆稻米悄悄拿到弟弟家前面的稻米堆中。
将七诚交给我的稻米放在了七南家院子内的稻米堆中。

string.name: name
string.value: 兄弟俩的稻米搬运2

string.name: parent
string.value: 感情深厚的两兄弟
七南说作为长子的哥哥家应该需要更多的稻米，便从自家的稻米堆中取出一个#t4031229#交给我，托我去放在七诚哥哥家院子里的稻米堆中。
将七南交给我的#t4031229#放在了七诚家院子内的稻米堆中。

string.name: name
string.value: 兄弟俩的稻米搬运3

string.name: parent
string.value: 感情深厚的两兄弟
七诚觉得稻米堆好像没有减少，托我再将#t4031229#拿给弟弟。
将七诚交给我的#t4031229#放在了七南家院子内的稻米堆中。

string.name: name
string.value: 兄弟俩的稻米搬运4

string.name: parent
string.value: 感情深厚的两兄弟
七南觉得稻米堆好像没有减少，托我再将#t4031229#拿给哥哥。
将七南交给我的#t4031229#放在了七诚家院子内的稻米堆中。

string.name: name
string.value: 兄弟情深

string.name: parent
string.value: 感情深厚的两兄弟
在帮七诚和七南悄悄搬运稻米时被七诚发现了。七诚说这让他们兄弟俩的感情更加深厚了，非常感激我。他说七南现在大概也已发现这件事，要我去弟弟那里看看。
在帮助童话村的七诚与七南兄弟俩搬运稻米的时候还是被他们发现了。兄弟俩的感情因此变得更加深厚了，为了表示对我的感激之情，他们告诉我只要想吃荞麦蒟蒻和猪肉串的时候可以随时再来找他们。

string.name: name
string.value: 遗失的葫芦种子
城隍庙附近有一只燕子翅膀受了伤不能动弹…
在城隍庙附近发现了一只翅膀受伤的燕子。燕子告诉我他遗失了正在递送的宝贵葫芦种子，希望我能替牠找回那个葫芦种子。燕子说在遗失葫芦种子的地方看到过一群行为诡异的兔子，难道是那些兔子们拿走了葫芦种子吗？\n\n#t4031241# #b#c4031241##k / 1
在城隍庙附近发现了一只翅膀受伤的燕子。燕子希望我能替它找回遗失的葫芦种子。燕子说在遗失葫芦种子的地方看到过行为诡异的兔子们，我对兔子们一一进行调查，终于找到了遗失的葫芦种子，并拿给了燕子。

string.name: name
string.value: 乐夫种瓜
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给乐夫如何？
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给了乐夫。听说是燕子带来的葫芦种子后，乐夫将葫芦种子种在自家屋顶上，并要我在葫芦成熟之后把它摘下并把里面的东西拿给他。
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给了乐夫。听说是燕子带来的葫芦种子后，乐夫将葫芦种子种在自家屋顶上，要我在葫芦成熟之后把它摘下。等葫芦熟了之后将其摘下，从里面出现了没收乐夫家财产的传票。贪婪的乐夫哇哇大哭了起来。

string.name: name
string.value: 兴夫种瓜
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给兴夫如何？
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给了兴夫。听说是燕子带来的葫芦种子后，兴夫将葫芦种子种在自家屋顶上，并要我在葫芦成熟之后把它摘下并把里面的东西拿给他。
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子拿给了兴夫。听说是燕子带来的葫芦种子后，兴夫将葫芦种子种在自家屋顶上，要我在葫芦成熟之后把它摘下。等葫芦熟了之后将其摘下，从里面出现了装满金银财宝的宝箱。

string.name: name
string.value: 燕子遗失的葫芦种子
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子弄丢了，再去找一次燕子吧。
把燕子交给我的葫芦种子弄丢了，再去找一次燕子吧。燕子说牠再去弄来葫芦种子，要我等一下再找牠。
因为弄丢了葫芦种子，所以再次前去找燕子，得到了新的葫芦种子。该把它交给谁呢？

string.name: name
string.value: 消灭鬼怪的准备

string.name: parent
string.value: 乌山鬼怪
听说童话村的地主朴大爷有件事情想要委托…

童话村的朴大爷请求我消灭村庄后山上的鬼怪。在乌山出现的鬼怪是从鬼怪故事书里逃出来的，藏身在山中的一所凶宅里。若想让藏的很隐密的鬼怪们现出原形，就需要有鬼怪喜欢的三种诱饵。要在村庄找出#b#t2022050#, #t2022051#, #t2022052##k，再回去找朴大爷。

#t2022050# #b#c2022050##k / 1
#t2022051# #b#c2022051##k / 1
#t2022052# #b#c2022052##k / 1
受朴大爷之托要消灭童话村后山出现的从鬼怪故事书中逃出来的鬼怪们，朴大爷告诉我为了引出隐藏起来的鬼怪，需要准备它们喜欢的荞麦蒟蒻、猪肉串、谷茶。这三样东西可以从兴夫、七南、小荳那里获得。

string.name: name
string.value: 消灭鬼怪

string.name: parent
string.value: 乌山鬼怪

拿着鬼怪喜欢的三样食品，开始正式消灭鬼怪的工作。朴大爷说到山中的凶宅附近放下诱饵就能引出鬼怪，并详细告诉我要放置诱饵的地方。猪肉串要放在石堆前面，荞麦蒟蒻要放在树洞里，谷茶要放在石灯里，是这样没错吧？

#o7130400# #r#a36113##k
#o7130401# #r#a36111##k
#o7130402# #r#a36112##k

#i4031232##t4031232# #b#c4031232##k/1
#i4031233##t4031233# #b#c4031233##k/1
#i4031234##t4031234# #b#c4031234##k/1
带着收集来的猪肉串、荞麦蒟蒻、谷茶来到乌山顶上的凶宅附近，引出3只鬼怪王并全部消灭了。把消灭鬼怪之后得到的宝物拿给了朴大爷，他将其中一件做为礼物送给了我。

string.name: name
string.value: 七诚的猪肉串
听说在童话村做猪肉串做的最好的是七诚…
因为听说童话村的七诚做的猪肉串最好吃，就去找到了他，他说只要我能拿给他月妙的臼锤5个和1000金币，就给我好吃的猪肉串。\n\n#t4000169# #b#c4000169##k/5
交给七诚#t4000169# 5个和1000金币，得到了猪肉串1个。

string.name: name
string.value: 七南的荞麦蒟蒻
听说在童话村里荞麦蒟蒻做的最好的是七南…
因为听说童话村的七南做的荞麦蒟蒻最好吃，就去找到了他，他说只要我能拿给他小虎的石板脚印4个和1000金币，就帮我做出荞麦蒟蒻。\n\n#t4000170# #b#c4000170##k/4
交给七南#t4000170# 4个和1000金币，得到了荞麦蒟蒻2个。

string.name: name
string.value: 小荳的谷茶
听说在童话村最好喝的谷茶是开客栈的小荳所做的…
因为听说童话村的小荳所做的谷茶味道最好，就去找了她，她说只要我能拿给她三尾狐的尾巴3个和1000金币，就帮我做谷茶。\n\n#t4000172# #b#c4000172##k/3
交给小荳#t4000172# 3个和1000金币，得到了谷茶5个。

string.name: name
string.value: 兴夫乐夫童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-兴夫乐夫的内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把整理好故事的童话书带给他。
受到图书馆管理员威兹的请托，将兴夫与乐夫之间弄乱的故事整理好了，并把完整的童话书带给了威兹。

string.name: name
string.value: 小荳红豆童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-小荳红豆的内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把整理好故事的童话书带给他。
受到图书馆管理员威兹的请托，将小荳与红豆之间弄乱的故事整理好了，并把完整的童话书带给了威兹。

string.name: name
string.value: 友爱的两兄弟童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-友爱的两兄弟内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把整理好故事的童话书带给他。
受到图书馆管理员威兹的请托，将友爱的两兄弟之间弄乱的故事整理好了，并把完整的童话书带给了威兹。

string.name: name
string.value: 鬼怪故事童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-鬼怪故事的内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把整理好故事的童话书带给他。
受到图书馆管理员威兹的请托，将弄乱的鬼怪故事整理好了，并把完整的童话书带给了威兹。

string.name: name
string.value: 破底的瓮

string.name: parent
string.value: 小荳的请托
听说童话村的小荳有件苦恼的事情。
小荳与继母一起住在童话村的客栈里。善良的小荳必须按照继母的指示在瓮里装满水，但因瓮的底已经破了一直在漏水，因此希望我能帮她找来#t4031230#。听说住在水碾屋的莲婆婆有卖瓮，若告诉莲婆婆出海钓鱼的老公的消息，应该就会给我一个瓮吧。\n\n#t4031230# #b#c4031230##k/1
小荳因为瓮坏掉了而焦急万分，我把水碾屋莲婆婆做好的#t4031230#交给了她。据说莲婆婆只给身边亲近的几个人做瓮而已。下次有机会再去看看小荳吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 采艾蒿

string.name: parent
string.value: 小荳的请托
听说童话村的小荳有件苦恼的事情。
再去看小荳，小荳仍然忙着做家事。因为继母想吃艾蒿糕，所以必须要去采#t4031231#，但又要在今天之内把所有衣服都洗好，根本没有时间去采。我决定替可怜的小荳去采来#t4031231#.. \n\n#t4031231# #b#c4031231##k/12
替忙于做家事而焦急万分的小荳在村子和山上采来了艾蒿，小荳总是有做不完的家事呢。下次有机会的话再去看看她吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 断掉的木锄头

string.name: parent
string.value: 小荳的请托
听说童话村的小荳有件苦恼的事情。
又一次去看小荳，小荳正疲惫的坐在院子里。继母要她在中午之前把田地都给耕好，可是锄头因为太老旧而断掉了。小荳说如果能有坚固耐用的铁锄头就能耕田了，既然这样就由我来帮她吧#t4031222#吧。据说可以在乌山的鬼怪身上得到#t4031222#... \n\n#t4031222# #b#c4031222##k/1
带着乌山鬼怪们身上掉出的#t4031222#给了因为木锄头断掉而哭泣的小荳，小荳连连道谢着，到田里耕作去了。真希望可怜的小荳今后能顺顺利利的…

string.name: name
string.value: 狩猎老虎
听说童话村的朴大爷正在为消灭老虎而招募人手…

童话村的朴大爷说出没于乌山的虎精经常侵扰人们，希望我消灭10只虎精，并带来10个虎皮作为证据。

#t4000171# #b#c4000171##k/10
#o5100005# #r#a36221#
受朴大爷之托，消灭了住在乌山侵扰童话村人们的虎精10只，并带去了10个虎皮。朴大爷对我的勇猛表现赞叹不已。

string.name: name
string.value: 莲婆婆的瓮
听说童话村的莲婆婆手艺非常好，能做一手好瓮。
因为需要新的瓮，所以去找到了水碾屋的莲婆婆。婆婆说为了上一次我替她老公跑腿的事表示谢意，特别以优待价把瓮卖给我。#b5千金币#k真的很便宜的吗？
支付了5千金币，买到了莲婆婆的瓮。

string.name: name
string.value: 友爱的两兄弟童话书
帮助七诚、七南俩兄弟之后分明已得到童话书，怎么不见了呢？再去找一趟七南吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031237##k。以前帮助七诚、七南兄弟之后有收到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到七南并说明了情况后，他说只要给哥哥带去#b#t4000095# 5个#k就会再给我童话书。\n\n#t4000095# #b#c4000095##k/5
为了再得到#t4031237#，依照七南的嘱托将#t4000095# 5个转交给了七诚。

string.name: name
string.value: 小荳红豆童话书
帮助小荳之后分明已得到童话书，怎么不见了呢？再去找一趟小荳吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031236##k。以前帮助小荳之后有收到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到小荳说明了情况后，她说只要为她带来用以做晚餐的#b#t4000166# 5个#k就会给我童话书。\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k/5
为了再得到#t4031236#，依照小荳的嘱托弄来了#t4000166# 5个。

string.name: name
string.value: 兴夫乐夫童话书(兴夫)
帮助兴夫之后分明已得到童话书，怎么不见了呢？再去找一趟兴夫吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031235##k。以前帮助兴夫之后有收到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到兴夫说明了情况后，他说只要给那只翅膀受过伤的燕子带去#b#t4000168# 10个#k就能得到童话书。\n\n#t4000168# #b#c4000168##k/10
为了再得到#t4031235#，按照兴夫的嘱托给燕子带去#t4000168# 10个。

string.name: name
string.value: 兴夫乐夫童话书(乐夫)
教训乐夫之后分明已得到童话书，怎么不见了呢？再去找一趟乐夫吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031235##k。以前帮助乐夫之后有收到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到乐夫再次向他要童话书时，乐夫却说要拿给他#b#t4000100# 2个#k才能给我童话书。\n\n#t4000100# #b#c4000100##k/2
为了再得到#t4031235#，必须拿#t4000100# 2个给乐夫。

string.name: name
string.value: 鬼怪故事童话书
消灭3只鬼怪王之后分明从朴大爷那里得到了童话书，怎么不见了呢？再去找一趟朴大爷吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031238##k。以前消灭鬼怪王之后有得到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到朴大爷说明了情况后，他说只要拿给他#b#t4000173# 10个#k，就能得到童话书。\n\n#t4000173# #b#c4000173##k/10
为了再得到#t4031238#，必须拿#t4000173# 10个给朴大爷。

string.name: name
string.value: 成为日月的兄妹
听说童话村的某个地方站着一位少年，正等待着别人的帮助…

#b#p2071008##k是与母亲和妹妹一起住在童话村的少年，似乎正在焦急地寻找着什么东西。询问之后才得知，原来是前天晚上乌山的老虎趁母亲不在家时来到了村里，威胁要吃掉少年和他的妹妹。所以兄妹两人必须在老虎来到之前先逃跑，但他们需要#b#t4031268# 20个#k。另外不知为什么还需要#r#o2230106##k掉出的#b#t4031269# 1个#k，少年希望我能帮助他们。

#t4031268# #b#c4031268##k / 20
#t4031269# #b#c4031269##k / 1

string.name: name
string.value: 成为日月的兄妹童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
图书馆的#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-变成太阳和月亮的兄妹内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把故事整理好的童话书带给他。
为了再得到#t4031270#，依照少年所说的，给他们买了5个#t2020001# 。

string.name: name
string.value: 成为日月的兄妹童话书
帮助#p2071008#之后分明得到了童话书，怎么会不见了呢？再去找一下少年吧？
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆的管理员威兹托我为他带来#b#t4031270##k。以前帮助少年之后有得到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到少年说明了情况后，他说只要给肚子饿的妹妹买来#b#t2020001# 5个#k，就能给我童话书。\n\n#t2020001# #b#c2020001##k / 5
为了再得到#t4031270#，依照少年所说的，给他们买了5个#t2020001#

string.name: name
string.value: 沈师铭的请托
去拜访童话村的沈师铭吧，听说最近他的身体很不好…

在童话村见到了#b#p2071009##k。他非常疼爱他的独生女儿。可是，随着年龄不断增长，最近他的双眼看起东西变得模糊起来，真担心这样下去他会变成瞎子啊。他很想要一副'老花眼镜'，可是那副眼镜竟然需要#b#t4031279# 300个#k，所以只好托我帮忙。不过#t4031279#要在哪里才能得到呢？
对了！沈师铭曾经说过#b赫丽奥斯塔#k里的#r#o3210208##k身上可以找到... 

#t4031279# #b#c4031279##k / 300
在童话村见到了因为眼睛日趋衰退而担心的#p2071009#。听到他可怜的遭遇之后便答应了借给他#t4031279# 300个。可是我连一粒米都没有啊... 幸亏打倒#o3210208#之后得以获得#t4031279# 。为了表示感谢，#p2071009#给了我#t4031280#。

string.name: name
string.value: 孝女沈清童话书的整理
听说赫丽奥斯塔图书馆变得乱七八糟…
#b#p2040052##k说，童话书-孝女沈清的内容被弄乱了，请求我去整理故事，并把故事整理好的童话书带给他。
受到#p2040052#的请托，将弄乱的孝女沈清童话书的故事整理好了，并把完整的童话书带给了威兹。

string.name: name
string.value: 孝女沈清童话书
帮助#p2071009#之后分明得到了童话书，怎么会不见了呢？再去找一趟#p2071009#吧？
赫丽奥斯塔的#b#p2040052##k托我为他带来#b#t4031280##k。以前给#p2071009#弄来#t4031279# 300个之后有得到过这样东西，可是现在却找不到了。找到#p2071009#说明了情况后，他说只要我帮他收集到用来制作沈清喜欢的花束材料#b#t4000165# 10个#k，就能给我童话书。\n\n#t4000165# #b#c4000165##k / 10
为了再得到#t4031280#，依照#p2071009#之托，带去了沈清喜欢的花束材料#t4000165# 10个并得到了童话书。

string.name: name
string.value: 狩猎狐狸
去见一下童话村的长老#p2071000#吧。
童话村的长老#b#p2071000##k正因住在乌山的#r#o5100004##k向村民施加诅咒，导致村民中生病的人不断增多而非常担心。为了解开施加在村民身上的诅咒，需要#b狐狸尾巴 999个#k，而每只#t4000172#身上会有#b3个#k狐狸尾巴，快去弄来#b#t4000172# 333个#k吧。\n\n#t4000172# #b#c4000172##k / 333
为了治好被三尾狐诅咒的童话村村民，按照朴大爷之托带来了#t4000172# 333个。朴大爷也嘱咐我一定要小心三尾狐，并交给了我万能药。

string.name: name
string.value: 金银斧
在#m222010002#见到了头上长瘤、气喘吁吁的 #b#p2071010##k先生。几天前，他被不知何人丢弃的斧头砍伤，一气之下将斧头丢在池塘旁边。不久，斧头的主人#b#p2071011##k前来寻找，并委托我帮他遗失的斧头。我为此询问 #p2071011#.\n山神说樵夫的铁斧被怪物拿走了，他要我拿回黑斧木妖所给的斧头，由他来鉴定是否为 #b#t4031315##k。
接受乌山 #m222010002#的 #p2071010#先生的委托归还樵夫 #t4031315#，得到“金银斧”故事书。

string.name: name
string.value: 鉴定斧头
山神告诉我从 #r#o2130100##k处拿回的 #b斧头#是否是樵夫的铁斧，我要从黑斧木妖的斧头中挑选一把交给山神。
山神会告诉我他拿回的是什么斧头，找到樵夫的铁夫后归还给森林的樵夫。
按照山神所说，从黑斧木妖处拿回斧头，并交给山神进行鉴定。

string.name: name
string.value: 收集“金银斧”故事书
赫丽奥斯塔图书馆此时凌乱不整…
图书馆员怀兹说“金银斧”故事书先后顺序已被打乱，他委托我整理被打乱顺序的故事书。
接受图书馆员怀兹的委托，将山神与樵夫的故事重新排序，并将完整的故事书交给怀兹。

string.name: name
string.value: “金银斧”故事书
完成“为樵夫寻斧”任务后得到故事书遗失了，怎么办？再去山神那里看看吧。

接受赫丽奥斯塔图书馆员怀兹的委托，为他带回“金银斧”故事书。这本书在完成“为樵夫寻斧”任务后得到过，但现在却遗失了。去问山神，他要我找到修理金斧头和银斧头所需的金矿石和银矿石各1块，然后他会为我找到故事书。

#t4010006# #b#c4010006##k / 1
#t4010004# #b#c4010004##k / 1
为再次取得“金银斧”故事书，接受山神的委托寻找黄金母矿和银母矿各1块。

string.name: name
string.value: 被狐狸诱惑的青年

string.name: parent
string.value: 传说中的故乡
据说#b另一村庄#k的七南变得很怪异。#b七诚#k好像很担心哦…… 什么事情呢？去问问七诚吧。
七诚叹着气说七南像失去魂魄一样，整天呆坐着，不吃不喝。到底发生了什么事呢？去看一下#b七南#k吧。
七南呆呆地，张着嘴坐着…… 他好像说过狐狸…… 也许可以成为线索，去找找七诚吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 七诚的请求

string.name: parent
string.value: 传说中的故乡

去找七诚问问七南所说的狐狸吧。他讲了一些关于生活在乌山的三尾狐。如七诚所说，也许抓到三尾狐之后可以找到一些线索，去抓#r 三尾狐#k吧。 

#t4031790# #b#c4031790##k/1
抓三尾狐时找到了一个奇怪的衣角，把这个拿给七诚看吧。七诚看了之后大吃一惊，说这是生活在小山泉的山神的衣角。山神的衣角怎么会在三尾狐身上呢？快去找#b山神#k吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 狐狸的威胁

string.name: parent
string.value: 传说中的故乡
拜访了山神，发现他穿着很破旧的衣服深思着什么事情。据他说，出现了修炼很久练成九尾狐的狐狸…… 七南好像也被九尾狐迷惑失魂了。不过以山神的道力也无法击退九尾狐，这可怎么办呢？山神说\n\n乌山的老居民#b鬼怪们#k也许知道一些事情。在山神考虑如何对付九尾狐时，我去找#b深山里的鬼怪之家#k，了解一下击退九尾狐的方法吧。
幸好从鬼怪们那儿得到了击退九尾狐的方法。山神得到这个信息也非常高兴，希望我尽快把信息传给七诚…… 先传达给他吧，但七诚可以得到九尾狐的尾巴吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 蓝色鬼怪的希望
据山神说只有乌山的鬼怪了解九尾狐。去深山里的#b鬼怪之家#k见一下#b蓝色鬼怪#k吧。
蓝色鬼怪说帮忙找他喜欢的#b谷茶#k #b1个#k就可以提供九尾狐的信息。去那个村庄找一下谷茶吧。\n\n#i2022052##t2022052# #b#c2022052##k/1
从蓝色鬼怪哪儿得到了九尾狐经常出没的地区。

string.name: name
string.value: 黄色鬼怪的希望
据山神说只有乌山的鬼怪了解九尾狐。去深山里的#b鬼怪之家#k见一下#b黄色鬼怪#k吧。
黄色鬼怪说帮忙找他喜欢的#b猪肉串#k #b1个#k就可以提供九尾狐的信息。去那个村庄找一下猪肉串吧。\n\n#i2022050##t2022050# #b#c2022050##k/1
从黄色鬼怪那儿了解了九尾狐经常使用的魔法。

string.name: name
string.value: 绿色鬼怪的希望
据山神说只有乌山的鬼怪了解九尾狐。去深山里的#b鬼怪之家#k见一下#b绿色鬼怪#k吧。
绿色鬼怪说帮忙找他喜欢的#b荞麦蒟蒻#k #b1个#k就可以提供九尾狐的信息。去那个村庄找一下荞麦蒟蒻吧。 \n\n#i2022051##t2022051# #b#c2022051##k/1
从绿色鬼怪那儿了解了被九尾狐夺魂之后找回魂魄的方法。

string.name: name
string.value: 回魂

string.name: parent
string.value: 传说中的故乡

我把解救被九尾狐夺去魂魄的七南的方法告诉了七诚，他起初很高兴，但很快又叹气了。因为以他之力，无法夺取九尾狐的尾巴…… 替七诚击退#r九尾狐#k并拿回#b九尾狐的尾巴#k吧！ 

九尾狐 #r#a36471##k 
#i4031793##t4031793# #b#c4031793##k/1
用九尾狐的尾巴尖部轻轻地挠了挠七南的鼻子，七南打了个喷嚏，就恢复了正常。

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Love Affair with Seal Meat
#b#p2071007##k says she has a special favor to ask. I should go to #b#m222000000##k.

#b#p2071007##k says she used to love eating #t04000166#. 
Even #b#p2071007##k's husband knows how much she loves #t04000166# and would occasionally buy it for her. The problem is that since recently, #b#p2071007##k says she's been liking #b#t04000157##k more. I should help out #b#p2071007##k, who always has to get #b#t04000157##k secretly her husband's back.

#i04000157##t04000157# #b#c04000157#/15
#b#p2071007##k laughed with such excitement. It felt good to know that my efforts were not in vain.

string.name: name
string.value: 依托的任务
接受#m240000000# #p2081002#的委托，寻找温暖的莱西之羽 。 #p2081002#得到莱西之羽后用于孵蛋的保暖。

string.name: name
string.value: 库摩的任务

在#m240000000#见到 #p2081001#。 #p2081001#说自己孵化的蛋即将成功，但由于风的原因，蛋有掉落的危机，他委托我帮他建造一个孵化巢。我需要收集建造孵化巢所需的48个 #b#t4000236# 和 28个#b#t4000237# 

#t4000236# #b#c4000236##k / 48
#t4000237# #b#c4000237##k / 28

string.name: name
string.value: 亚可的任务

string.name: name
string.value: 潘姆的任务
在#m240000000#见到在给蛋唱歌的 #p2081004#。 #p2081004#既爱唱歌也爱演奏，他希望制作一支长笛，并委托我去找暴躁的妖怪 #r#o7130004#，收集回来 50个#b#t4000231#。\n\n#t4000231# #b#c4000231##k / 50
从变种侏儒怪处收集到了50个 #t4000231# 交给潘姆。潘姆制作了一支长笛，为自己的蛋演奏美妙的音乐。

string.name: name
string.value: 制药的材料
神木村好像出了什么事，去找潘姆聊聊吧。
神木村好像出了什么事。询问潘姆后得知村里的刺猬族在森林里遇到了凶恶的半人马，受伤严重。与村长对话后得知要配制刺猬族的疗伤药需要80个 #b#t4000241#，为了拯救受伤的刺猬族，去收集80个 #b#t4000241#吧。\n\n#t4000241# #b#c4000241##k / 80
与潘姆对话后得知为刺猬族疗伤需要采集邪恶绵羊嚼过的草，收集后交给潘姆。

string.name: name
string.value: 英雄的痕迹

string.name: parent
string.value: 消失的英雄
听说在神木村里的#b#p2081001##k很想知道一个人的下落...
在神木村的 #b#p2081001##k正在打听很久以前，从怪物手里救了他命的一位骑士的下落。他的名字叫 #b#p2081007##k... 跟#b#p2081001##k约定好去龙林寻找恩人的下落.
#b#p2081007##k很久以前从怪物的手里救出了神木村的库摩，去飞龙的峡谷能找到他.

string.name: name
string.value: 敢死队的任务

string.name: parent
string.value: 消失的英雄
从龙林里传出了呻吟的声音，好像有人受伤了...
在龙林里遇到了受重伤的 #b#p2081007##k.拉乌尔说出了他们敢死队执行的重要的任务,要求得到帮助完成任务.他们的任务是夺回暗黑龙王夺去的 #b#t4001094##k,送回到巢穴里 .打败暗黑龙王夺回#b#t4001094##k就会遇到一个人...
答应了暗黑龙王敢死队队长 #b#p2081007##k的请求,为了继续完成他们的任务击败了龙王并夺回了 #b#t4001094##k,送回了巢穴里. 从蛋里孵化出了 #b#p2081008##k.从此以后小飞龙是否能守卫森林呢

string.name: name
string.value: 暗黑龙王的下场
被囚禁在牢狱里的#b#p2081006##k有件事情需要帮助..
被囚禁在牢狱里的 #b#p2081006##k请求敢死队击退暗黑龙王,为九灵龙报仇,重新带给森林宁静.\n\n击退暗黑龙王#r#a37071##k
完成了#b#p2081006##k的请求击退了暗黑龙王,米纳尔森林真的重新恢复了宁静吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 赤木

string.name: parent
string.value: 森林尽处
住在#m240000000#的#p2081003#说,他在森林里看到过奇怪的树…
#p2081003#在米纳尔森林,通向龙林的路口处发现树都 #b变成了赤色#k. 这件事其他人还不知道，他希望能转告村长.
为了#p2081003#的请求，去找 #p2081000#告诉他龙林入口，有关赤木的事情。

string.name: name
string.value: 得到汉斯的助言1

string.name: parent
string.value: 森林尽处
听到有关赤色树木的事情 #p2081000#觉得是不祥之兆, 他想听听在#m101000000#里的大魔法师 #p1032001#的意见,拜托#b#p1032001##k去一趟.

string.name: name
string.value: 得到汉斯的助言2

string.name: parent
string.value: 森林尽处

string.name: name
string.value: 飞龙的袭击
去看看在#m240040400#的某处负伤不省人事的#p2081007#
依照负伤在#m240040400#的#p2081007#的请求消灭了大部分飞龙,可是看到日益增多的飞龙还是按耐不住担心

string.name: name
string.value: 收回黑色灵魂
去看看在#m240040400#的某处负伤不省人事的#p2081007#

#p2081007#请求消灭掉被暗黑龙王黑色灵魂熏染的怪物们，把它们被污染的灵魂拿到被囚禁在牢笼里的 #b#p2081006##k做分析。 收集#b被熏染的怪物们的黑色灵魂#k拿给在生命洞穴入口的 #p2081006#那里。

#t4031412# #b#c4031412##k / 1
#t4031413# #b#c4031413##k / 1\m#t4031414# #b#c4031414##k / 1
#t4031415# #b#c4031415##k / 1
依照#p2081007#的嘱托，解救出了被暗黑龙王熏染的怪物们的黑色灵魂，拿给了 #p2081006#。

string.name: name
string.value: 新势力
#b#m240000000##k的 #b#p2081000##k看起来非常担忧... 什么事儿呢？去找塔塔曼吧。
#p2081000#说冒险岛出现了新的势力，希望调查一下他们到底是敌人还是朋友。据说去#b#m100030000##k就可以弄清他们的身份...
#m100030000#有之前未见过的巨大的木质入口。很像要塞的入口啊... 和站在前面的#p1094000#搭话，他说这里正在搭建#b海盗 #p1072008##k的要塞。

string.name: name
string.value: The Remnants of Horned Tail...
After defeating Horned Tail, I was able to acquire Nine Spirit's Egg. I better take it to Nine Spirit's nest and see what happens.
When I placed the egg on the nest, the egg hatched, and a baby dragon emerged from the nest.
After returning Nine Spirit's Egg onto its nest, the baby dragon hatched from the egg. As soon as the dragon emerged, it coughed for a little bit, and spat out #b#t2041200##k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Suspicious Wanderer
There is a rumor that Han the Broker of Magatia has acquired a new piece of information. Sounds exciting…

Han the Broker says a suspicious wanderer was staying in Magatia until just a few days ago, but then disappeared without a trace. Han the Broker thinks you might be able to find the wanderer if you follow the traces he left and suggests you first go to Ariant to find him.
You met Syras at Ariant Station to ask about the suspicious wanderer that Han the Broker has told you about. Syras at the ticket box desk said a strange man bought a ticket to Orbis.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bTalk to Syras, the ticket agent at Ariant Station.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in the "Wanderer's Whereabouts 1" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Wanderer's Whereabouts 1
#bSyras the ticket agent#k at Ariant Station claims the suspicious wanderer headed to Orbis and that you should talk to #bIsa#k at Orbis Station.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man
You meet Isa the station guide as Syras instructed. Isa says an absent-minded man asked her directions to Leafre. She added that he was rather strange.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bTalk to Isa the Station Guide in Orbis

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in the "Wanderer's Whereabouts 2" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Wanderer's Whereabouts 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bFind Tera Forest
Isa the station guide at Orbis Station informs you that the strange man was heading to Tera Forest, located east of Minar Forest. Will you be able to find this foreign place called Tera Forest?
You found the entrance to Tera Forest by searching the outskirts of east Minar Forest. There, you met the strange man you were searching for, Andy.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in the "Andy the Time Traveler" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Andy the Time Traveler

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man
Andy the Time Traveler has asked you to help him find the Pocket Watch, the key to the Time Gate, which he's lost in Minar Forest.
The Pocket Watch has chosen you as the new Time Traveler. You begin to wonder what you've got yourself into.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value:
EXP 40,000
#Wbasic#
#i4001393:# 1 #t4001393:#
Can participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

Andy the Time Traveler informs you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before you can travel through time. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the first test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and have earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to Average Town in the year 2021. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your first time travel.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 80,000\r\nCan participate in the "First Clue" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The First Clue
Year 2021. You must go through trash cans, find the clue that Andy needs, and bring it to him.

You teleported to the year 2021, found a piece of paper that appeared to be the clue, and took it to Andy. Unfortunately, that was not what Andy was looking for. Will your time travel end in failure? Go back to year 2021.

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day
Andy has a request.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 61,000\r\nCan participate in the 'Dangerous Slimes' quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Dangerous Slimes

The year is 2021. Eliminate 50 Slimes that are threatening the boy and another 50 Slimes that are threatening the girl. Then collect 30 dropped items from each group of Slimes to prevent the Slimes from reviving and report back to the Brainy Boy.
You worked hard to eliminate so many Slimes, but the population of the Slimes has not gotten any smaller. Where are these monsters coming from?

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 100,000\r\nCan participate in "The Crying Girl's Sketchbook" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Crying Girl's Sketchbook
Find Loose-Leaf Pages from the Sketchbook the Slimes ate and return it to the Crying Girl.\r\n
You have collected the Loose-Leaf Pages from the Sketchbook and returned them to the Girl. However, the girl seemed to be even more saddened by the pages that were chewed up by the Slimes.

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 65,000\r\nCan participate in "The Boy and the Girl" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Boy and the Girl

The Brainy Boy swore that he would find more Loose-Leaf Pages from the Crying Girl's Sketchbook, including her drawing of a Robot. This sounds like something Andy mentioned. Perhaps you should tell him about this.
When Andy heard the story about the kids, said it was a useful piece of information and that you should prepare yourself for your next time travel.

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your second time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Next the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your second time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the second test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 90,000\r\nCan participate in "The Hidden Truth about the Past" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Hidden Truth about the Past

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
Andy the Time Traveler has requested that you travel to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 to investigate and if possible, destroy the giant robot, if it exists.
You traveled to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 as Andy the Time Traveler has requested, during which time you spotted a giant robot and destroyed it as instructed.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 120,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Policeman in Danger

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 wants you to help him eliminate some monsters that have been taking over the harbor. Specifically, 50 Overlord A and 40 Overlord B monsters.
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to help him eliminate some monsters, so you eliminated Overlord A and Overlord B monsters.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 72,000\r\nCan participate in the "Shelter Key" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Shelter Key

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 wants you to find the Shelter Key and deliver it to Captain Edmond, who is somewhere at the harbor.

The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to find the Shelter Key and deliver it to Captain Edmond. You retrieved the key from the monsters and gave it to Captain Edmond at the quayside.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 60,000\r\nCan participate in the "Temporary Measure" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Temporary Relief

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
When you meet Captain Edmond in 2099, he asks you bring him 20 Overlord A Radar Devices and 40 Overlord B Radar Devices to temporarily stop the monsters at the harbor.
When you met Captain Edmond in 2099, he complained that he didn't approve of the monsters that overtook the harbor. He then asked that you bring him their radar devices, which you did.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your third time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your third time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the third test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the Bombed City Center in the year 2099. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 110,000\r\nCan participate in the "Identity of the Missile" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Identity of the Missile

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing
Andy the Time Traveler has asked you to travel to the year 2215 to investigate the Bombed City Center and destroy the A.I. missile known as Dunas.

Andy the Time Traveler asked you to travel to the year 2215 to investigate the Bombed City Center and destroy the A.I. missile known as Dunas. To your surprised, you discovered that Dunas was an android missile that closely resembled a human. You may have succeeded in destroying Dunas, but the Bombed City Center doesn't appear to be restorable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 140,000\r\nCan participate in the '"Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Rambunctious Robots

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

You meet May in the middle of the Bombed City Center in the year 2215. What's she doing in the destroyed City Center? In any case, she asks you to defeat the Robbies that appeared after the bombing. She says they're so loud and rambunctious that she's about to have a nervous breakdown.

You met May in the middle of the Bombed City Center in the year 2215. She asked you to defeat the Robbies that appeared after the bombing. She said they were so loud and rambunctious that she was about to have a nervous breakdown. Well, that worked out since you were thinking about getting rid of those noisy robots anyway.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 90,000\r\nCan participate in the "Survivor Search" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Survivor Search

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

May was happy that you were able to reduce the population of the noisy Robbies, but was also concerned that she may be the only survivor left. She asks you to investigate the area where the missile landed and search for survivors.

You have searched the area all the way to the location where the missile landed, as May requested. Fortunately, you were able to find a male survivor named Bao. How is it that he doesn't even have a tiny scratch on him?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 30,000\r\nCan participate in "The Dangerous Android" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Dangerous Android

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

May was right. When you went into the City Center, you found another survivor, Bao. Bao could not move an inch because he was so afraid of Iruvatas and asked that you help him. He appears to be a big guy, but really, he's just a softie inside.
You defeated Iruvatas that were scaring Bao. Bao thanked you for your help. What a softie.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 90,000\r\nCan participate in the "The Wreckage of the Missile" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Wreckage of the Missile

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

Bao says that the Iruvatas and Robbies seem to come from the place the missile landed and suggests you search around there. How did he know you were looking for something? He seemed a little dull and slow, but perhaps he actually has a perceptive side. Anyway, investigate and report your findings to Andy.

Bao said that the Iruvatas and Robbies seemed to come from the area the missile landed and suggested you search there. You then defeated Dunas the missile android in the bombed City Center and delivered the Time Sand you acquired to Andy.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your fourth time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Next the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your fourth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the fourth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the ruins of the city in year 2216. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 130,000\r\nCan participate in the "Central Robot Aufheben" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Central Robot Aufheben

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216 - The Ruins

Andy has requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controls all electronic devices in the city. Andy says if Dunas was an android, it is very likely that Aufheben is also an android.

Andy requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controlled all electronic devices in the city. As suspected, Aufheben was an android. The battle between humans and robots seems interminable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 170,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Disturbing the Army of Robots

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

You have traveled to the year 2216 on your fourth time travel. Thanks to Ken, who assumes you are from the support unit, you must eliminate monsters. Things keep coming up and hindering you from doing what you're here to do. Keep in mind that you are here for a reason.

You traveled to the year 2216 on your fourth time travel. Thanks to Ken, who just assumed that you were from the support unit, you had to eliminate monsters. Conditions in the city appear to be deteriorating.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 105,000\r\nCan participate in "Isabella's Search" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Isabella's Search

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

Ken, who you met in the ruins of the city in the year 2216, requests that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You must hurry and find the person who he suspects to be a teenage female. Begin your search right away.

Ken, whom you met in the ruins of the city in year 2216, requested that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You found a teenage female who appeared to be passed out from exhaustion. Fortunately, she was conscious when you talked to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 50,000\r\nCan participate in the "What Was That I Saw?" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: What Was That I Saw?

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

When she regained consciousness, Isabella kept rambling nonsense about how she saw an angel to the east, where the high rise collapsed. An angel? Is she insane? The only way to confirm that is to go over and see for yourself. You may even find a Time Sand.
When she regained consciousness, Isabella kept rambling nonsense about how she saw an angel. The only way to confirm that was to go over and see for yourself. You did, and even found a Time Sand.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your fifth time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your fifth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the fifth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the dangerous towers of the year 2230. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 140,000\r\nCan participate in "The New and Improved, Oberon" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The New and Improved, Oberon

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!

Andy says, based on the findings from the previous time travels, it is likely that the Fifth Time Sand is in the year 2230. He wants you to defeat Oberon, an android even more advanced than Aufheben, and bring back the Time Sand.
As Andy suspected, Oberon had the Fifth Time Sand. You have successfully defeated Oberon and found the Fifth Time Sand in the dangerous tower in the year 2230.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat the Mavericks

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!
Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, has asked you to eliminate the pesky Mavericks and report it to Nalo.

Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, asked you to eliminate some pesky Mavericks. You did so and reported it to Nalo at the top of the tower. Nalo seemed concerned about Hoya's immature and irresponsible actions.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2503- From the Sky
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your sixth time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your sixth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the sixth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the Air Battleship of the year 2503. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 150,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nibelung's Song" quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Nibelung's Song

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2503- From the Sky
In the end, Andy says the answer is in the year 2503, where he's from. He wants you to travel to the year 2503 to destroy Nibelung and report it to Ashura. Will this solve the problem?
You destroyed Nibelung and reported that to Ashura. She showed her gratitude and wished for peaceful days in the future.

string.name: name
string.value: 诺功的教导1

string.name: parent
string.value: 诺功的教导
在#b#m250000000##k有位帮助仙人训练体力的教官#b#p2091000##k.去他那里能不能成为仙人呢?
#o5120503#都抓好了，但是 #p2091000#没说一句赞扬的话.什么嘛,这个人? 真的会让我成为仙人吗?

string.name: name
string.value: 诺功的教导2

string.name: parent
string.value: 诺功的教导
#b#p2091000##k的要求抓好了 #o5120503# 10只,但他露出那没什么了不起的表情.到底在搞什么? 有点生气.再去找 #p2091000#吧.
#o5120503#抓好了但#p2091000#仍然没说一句赞扬的话.越想越生气.

string.name: name
string.value: 诺功的教导3

string.name: parent
string.value: 诺功的教导
#b#p2091000##k的要求去打倒了 #o5120503# 20只,但 #p2091000#仍然没有想让我变仙人的想法.这个人,真的是教官吗? 虽然自尊心不允许但是还是再找他问问吧.
问了有关仙人的事,但#p2091000#表情木木地要求去打#r#o5120503# 40只#k. 10只, 20只… 现在居然要 40只?! 以为在训练警犬啊!虽然生气但已经努力到这个地步,绝对不能放弃. 按照#p2091000#的话去做吧.\n\n#o5120503# #r#a38021##k
#o5120503# 抓好40只,但#p2091000#仍然呆滞的表情只会点头。做到这一步至少夸几句嘛, #p2091000#居然说要成为仙人还早,应该把精力多投入到修炼中.这个人，真的能让我成为仙人么?

string.name: name
string.value: 丢失的天书

string.name: parent
string.value: 道功的教导
在#b#m250000000##k有位知道成为仙人方法的,负责仙人们的精神修炼的教官 #b#p2091001##k.
#p2091001#说有本天书能让人成仙。#p2091001#接着又说,但是这本印着道术的书被遗弃在蟠桃果林外的#m250010501#,所以有些破旧.寻找破旧的#b#t4000299##k的话能成为仙人吗?\n\n#t4000299# #i4000299# #b#c4000299##k/10

string.name: name
string.value: 猫元灵大扫除

string.name: parent
string.value: 道功的教导
记录着成为仙人的神秘方法的天书.找来了天书所有的页数,但#b#p2091001##k仍然表情深刻地观察着 #t4000299#. 到底又有什么问题? 什么时候给我做仙人啊? 去找 #p2091001#看看吧.

#p2091001#看了 #t4000299#说上面有猫爪子印,可能就是野猫偷看了天书学了道术.#p2091001#说不能让这些猫妖精在草丛中乱跑,要求抓 #r#o6130209# 20只#k,并搜集#b#t4031433# 5个#k…

#t4031433# #b#c4031433##k/5 
#o6130209# #r#a38041##k
消除#o6130209#得到#t4031433#, #p2091001#夸奖说做的很了不起,但是还是不能给#o5120506#… 虽然单单用天书也能掌握道术,但那样练道术跟妖怪没什么两样,只有心平气和地修炼才能真正成为仙人.呼..白辛苦了一场,但确实说的有道理.到底什么时候才能成为仙人呢.

string.name: name
string.value: 猿公大扫除

string.name: parent
string.value: 守护蟠桃果林
在#b#m250000000##k拥有蟠桃果林的#b#p2091002##k有一些麻烦…
消除了偷吃蟠桃的#o6130207#. 现在蟠桃应该安全了吧?

string.name: name
string.value: 搜集蟠桃核

string.name: parent
string.value: 守护蟠桃果林
#b#m250000000##k的药材商及蟠桃果林的主人#b#p2091002##k. 听说他有一些麻烦…
#p2091002#说虽然已经消除了 #o6130207#但被摘走的蟠桃数量太多,整个蟠桃收获量会减少很多.所以为了要种更多的蟠桃要求去搜集#b#t4000282# 100个#k…\n\n#t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/100
搜集好#t4000282#. #p2091002#终于放心地松了口气.

string.name: name
string.value: 药草地的入侵者1

string.name: parent
string.value: 药草地的入侵者
#b#m251000000##k 药草长 #b#p2092000##k据说好象有一些苦恼的事情…
#p2092000#说他的药草地遭到#b#o5120501##k们侵入,并装作是人参后，把草地的养分全吸走.为了让人参好好生长他拜托消除#r#o5120501# 80只#k.\n\n#o5120501# #r#a38071##k
在#p2092000#的药草地破坏人参生长的#o5120501#全部清楚掉了.

string.name: name
string.value: 药草地的入侵者2

string.name: parent
string.value: 药草地的入侵者

药草长#p2092000#管理的药草地被某人入侵并把药草偷走了. #p2092000#说分明是红鼻子海盗团的恶行,并要求去抓#r#o6130208##k和 #r#o7130104##k.

#o6130208# #r#a38081##k
#o7130104# #r#a38082##k
抓到了#o6130208#和 #o7130104#. 抓到了药草贼,#p2092000#也应该放心了吧.

string.name: name
string.value: 神仙的条幅1

string.name: parent
string.value: 神仙的条幅
#p2071010#说他借读过的#b#t4031430:##k要还给在 #b#m250000000##k的精神修炼教官 #b#p2091001:##k并要求再借 #b#t4031431##k. 呵! 那么说 #p2071010#是初级神仙吗?

string.name: name
string.value: 神仙的条幅2

string.name: parent
string.value: 神仙的条幅

string.name: name
string.value: 神仙的条幅3

string.name: parent
string.value: 神仙的条幅
把#t4031431#交给#p2071010#. 现在 #p2071010#也会成为中级神仙吧. 成了中级神仙的话不光是金斧,连宝石斧也能做吧?

string.name: name
string.value: 海盗大扫除
桔梗精 #b#p2094000##k好象在密谋着什么事情.到底是什么事情呢?

#p2094000#有个计划就是解放那些被海盗抓去当奴隶的桔梗精.但是靠他一个人的力量是无法实现的,所以要求去杀掉#r#o9300117##k和 #r#o9300118##k各200个… 老海盗的手下有好几种,其中心腹与其他家伙不一样,他经常只暂时露面后马上消失.一定要记好形象,抓的时候别搞混了. 

#o9300117# #r#a38121##k
#o9300118# #r#a38122##k
把海盗船上面的 #o9300117#和 #o9300118#打倒了. 但是目前为止还是海盗人数多，而且老海盗也很强健,能解放得了桔梗精吗?

string.name: name
string.value: 无法无天的海盗们
桔梗精 #b#p2094000##k正在找能拯救他们的王的勇士…
#p2094000#原来是桔梗精王的侍从.他开始讲述其实桔梗精一开始是不攻击人的,在和平的环境下生活着.但是某一天老海盗出现把 #b桔梗精之王 #p2094001##k给绑架了.害怕被抓为人质的 #p2094001#处在危险之中,只能按照老海盗的命令攻击人类.居然折磨热爱和平的桔梗精,简直太可恶了!打倒#r#o9300119##k去拯救桔梗精之王#p2094001#
击败了#o9300105#,拯救了桔梗精之王 #p2094001#. 把王救出来,桔梗精们应该能重新能过和平生活吧?

string.name: name
string.value: 海盗的航海图
#b#m104000000##k的 #b#p9000009##k有个很久以来一直就想做的事…
#p9000009#很想穿越暴风之海,并拜托去帮他搜集画着暴风海路线图的#b#t4001119##k. 据#p9000009#说只有体验过暴风之海的唯一的海盗#r老海盗#k拥有这个分成六份的#b#t4001118##k… 那么是不是得去老海盗的窝啊! \n\n#t4001118# #b#c4001118##k/6
从老海盗窝里得到的#t4001118#全部交给了 #p9000009#. 取得航海图的 #p9000009#由于可以去体验暴风之海格外高兴.明知危险还想去, #p9000009#确实是个真正的冒险家啊.

string.name: name
string.value: 寻找太上的药材
在#b#m250000000##k的#b#p2091002##k据说正在寻找更好的药材…

string.name: name
string.value: 制作蛇尾汤1

string.name: parent
string.value: 制作蛇尾汤
#b#m250000000##k的体力锻炼教官#b#p2091000##k说需要帮助……
#p2091000#看到过很多修炼过程中受伤的修炼生，得带材料去#b#p2091002##k那儿拿药。材料是#b#t4000281# 10个#k，得先准备了。\n\n#t4000281# #b#c4000281##k/10
#p2091002#说要给锻炼体能的修炼生制#t2022144#。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作蛇尾汤2

string.name: parent
string.value: 制作蛇尾汤
从#p2091002#那儿收到了#b#t4031552##k。味道还可以？赶紧送给#b#p2091000##k吧。
给#p2091000#传递了#t2022144#。有点羡慕可以吃完这些之后认真修炼的那些人。幸好 #p2091000#给了 #t2022144#。味道到底如何呢？

string.name: name
string.value: 制作熊掌汤1

string.name: parent
string.value: 制作熊掌汤
#b#m250000000##k的精神修炼教官 #b#p2091001##k说需要帮忙……

string.name: name
string.value: 制作熊掌汤2

string.name: parent
string.value: 制作熊掌汤
拿到了#p2091002#做的#b#t4031553##k。嗷……味道很刺鼻啊。要熬这个喝，#p2091001#的胆子还蛮大的，赶紧送给#b#p2091001##k吧。
给#p2091001#送去了光闻就能让人清醒的 #t2022142#。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作神仙汤
给#p2091002#送去了所有材料。如果是吃了补身体，看起来还蛮不错的，但是能成为神仙吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 照看韩太守的蟠桃

#p2091003#说想找一个可以让蟠桃树健康成长的药物。虽然药是#p2091002#制得好，但是也不能请求作为果园主人的他，希望从#b#p2090004##k那儿拿些#b#t4031554##k…… \n\n#t4031554# #b#c4031554##k/1
从#p2090004#那儿拿药给了#p2091003#。呼～从#p2090004#拿药比看护蟠桃树难多了～

#b#p2071006##k好像知道 #p2091001#的事。但是感觉记得不是很清楚……

给#p2071006#送去了药。虽然身处异乡，但受到多方照顾的#p2071006#。真希望你尽快痊愈，可以重新翱翔在天空中～

#b#p2092001##k看起来像是一个经验丰富的船员。和他合力的话打败老海盗手下也不是什么难事吧……？

string.name: parent

看了#t4031436#，#p2092001#显得很高兴。看到一向稳重的他那么高兴，我也觉得很兴奋。现在只要给#m250000000#供好药材就可以了吧？

string.name: name
string.value: 海盗船长

打开#t4031551#箱子，找到了宝物并交给了#p2092001#。

string.name: name
string.value: 陈道人的药材组合法
据说在#b#m250000000##k有个叫#b#p2090004##k的怪异的药剂师……
#p2090004#说他是#p2091002#的徒弟，并且是有实力的药剂师。总觉得有些令人怀疑…… 他说他在研究只能在#m250000000#求到的名贵药材的组合，希望可以抓到#r#o5120506##k，并把关于药材组合的#b#t4000298##k拿给他。\n\n#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/25
把#t4000298#递给了#p2090004#，他就把自己的#b#t4161030##k给了我，并说只要把这本书拿来可以随时帮我制药。虽然不是那么相信他，但以后有机会的时候也可以找他试一下。

#b#m250000000##k的体力锻炼教官#b#p2091000##k想考一下仙人修炼中的他们……

击退了#o4230505# 400只，#p2092001#也长出了一口气。但是到底是进了什么东西……也还是一个迷。

string.name: name
string.value: 韩太守的所见

string.name: parent
string.value: 被遗忘的仙人
听说守着武陵蟠桃果园的#b韩太守#k，不久前从村庄回到果园时经历了很怪异的事情……
在通天林韩太守被可怕的野生熊袭击了。在千钧一发之际，某人来拯救了无法动弹的韩太守…… 好像是第一次见到的熊。韩太守很想了解熊的情况，希望去问一下#b诺功#k。
听到熊的故事之后诺功显得很沉重……

string.name: name
string.value: 诺功的弟子

string.name: parent
string.value: 被遗忘的仙人
诺功有一个中了妖怪的魔法失去理性而攻击村庄居民的弟子。他的名字是#b肯德熊#k... 在诺功的弟子中他最聪明，现在在村庄外苦行，只等着妖怪的魔法变弱…… \n\n诺功说看他可以帮韩太守，肯德熊所受的魔力可能已经解除了，希望#b道功#k可以帮他确认一下。
道功说为了肯德熊他随时可以帮忙。再去和道功搭话吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 道功的魔法

string.name: parent
string.value: 被遗忘的仙人

道功说肯德熊通过期间的苦行，把大部分的魔法都削弱了，再加上道功的魔法，也许可以打破所中的魔法。为了道功施法，需要找一些材料…… 

#i4000288# #t4000288# #b#c4000288##k/10 
#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/10 
#i4000282# #t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/50
道功开始施魔法…… 结果失败了。告诉诺功吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 击倒肯德熊

string.name: parent
string.value: 被遗忘的仙人
道功的魔法失败了……诺功显得更加沉重了，说为了肯德熊，如果以后见到失去理性的肯德熊，就直接击倒他。\n\n#o7220000# #r#a38381##k
击倒肯德熊后回去找了诺功。诺功悲喜交加地说，现在肯德熊应该感到舒服些了。\n\n了解了关于肯德熊的真相，回去找一下#b韩太守#k吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 韩太守的报答

string.name: parent
string.value: 被遗忘的仙人

石桌上出现了感谢信... 交给韩太守之后，他笑得很开心。这个小纸条才是肯德熊的真心。

string.name: name
string.value: 弱化妖怪禅师

string.name: parent
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师
据说#b武陵#k的精神修炼教官#b道功#k有一个心事……
活了一千多年，逐步失去灵物本性变成妖怪的妖怪禅师就是道功的心事。道功希望我帮他击退以狡猾的计谋试图让武陵陷入混乱的妖怪禅师…… 要想击退妖怪禅师，必须先击退妙仙来弱化它的力量，收回#b猫咪娃娃#k。\n\n#i4000289# #t4000289# #b#c4000289##k/100
击退妙仙后收回了猫咪娃娃。道功给猫咪娃娃施了魔法，并说可以去#b#m250010503##k确认魔法是否有效。去一趟妖怪森林吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 妖怪禅师的召唤

string.name: parent
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师
到了#b#m250010503##k后突然传来了某人的声音……
#m250010503#中，突然#r妖怪禅师#k过来搭话了。妖怪禅师说想解释一下一直以来对他的误会…… 是真的吗？去找找妖怪禅师所说的，#b妖怪森林2#k的#b丢失雕像的石床#k吧。
妖怪禅师说他对武陵无可愧疚，这一切都是嫉妒他的道功的计谋。不可能吧…… 再详细问问妖怪禅师吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 道功的危机

string.name: parent
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师
妖怪禅师自称为妙仙王，说自己是善良的仙人，虽被道功诬陷，但不想与他为敌，希望以和为贵。并把灵药当作礼物送给了#b道功#k…… 我把红色珍珠交给了道功。
妖怪禅师给道功的不是灵药！是毒药！道功能平安无事吗？去看看吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 妖怪禅师的提问

string.name: parent
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师
被妖怪禅师骗了，把有毒的红色珍珠交给了道功，害得他中了毒。竟然说谎…… 得通过石床再去找妖怪禅师算账！
妖怪禅师说如果我能回答三个问题就可以给我#b解药#k…… 但是他的提问没有一个是有正确答案的。他一开始就没想给解药！怎么办？去找道功吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师

string.name: parent
string.value: 击退妖怪禅师

向道功说了与妖怪禅师的对话内容，道功说这是必然结果。看来无法通过谈话拿到解药了。没有其他办法了…… 只能通过战斗！击退#r妖怪禅师#k后拿#b解药#k吧！

#o7220002# #r#a38441##k 
#i4031789# #t4031789# #b#c4031789##k/1
击退妖怪禅师后把解药交给了道功。幸好道功的毒消了。以后要注意，不能轻信危险的家伙。

string.name: name
string.value: The Rumor in the Sea of Fog
Captain Hwang from Herb Town wants to tell you a creepy rumor about the Sea of Fog, located east of Herb Town. His story could be interesting. How about it, huh?

Captain Hwang from Herb Town tells you about the eastern route that connects Herb Town and Aqua Road. As the longest waterway in Maple World, this route passes through what is known as the #b"Sea of Fog"#k, located east of Mu Lung Garden. He says there is a rumor that a ghost ship sails around this Sea of Fog.\r\nCaptain Hwang then suggests that you look for the ghost ship. He hints that you might be able to get some information from the Dolphin Taxi.

Captain Hwang from Herb Town told you about the eastern route that connects Herb Town and Aqua Road. As the longest waterway in Maple World, this route passes through what is known as the #b"Sea of Fog"#k, located east of Mu Lung Garden. He says there is a rumor that a ghost ship sails around this Sea of Fog. You were instantly drawn to Captain Hwang's story and arrived in an unknown island in the Sea of Fog. You discovered the ghost ship with the help of the Dolphin Taxi, which brought you to that mysterious place.

string.name: name
string.value: 学习阿里安特的文化
建在沙漠上的村庄， #m260000000#. 和其他村庄的感觉不一样？ #m260000000# 人们都很木纳？不好搭话哦…… 听说文化学者 #b#p2101005##k 在 #m260000000#做研究，就向他请教吧。
#p2101005#说 #m260000000# 的人们警觉性很高，若能喝村庄的水，大家就会信任你。#b宫殿那边有绿洲#k，去那儿看看？
喝完水之后回到了#p2101005#，#m260000000#人们说，现在可以相信我了，并且说明了现在#m260000000#的状况。有点复杂的 #m260000000#... 得小心一些？

string.name: name
string.value: 宫殿警卫 提干
#m260000000#的宫殿戒备森严，混不进去。但是很想进去看一眼…… 向宫殿警卫队长#b#p2101004##k求助？
#p2101004#坚定地说，不准进入宫殿。但如果交些金币，表示下对苏丹的忠诚，可以给宫殿出入证。交#b2000金币#k倒不难，不过看起来像贿赂？
给#p2101004# 2000金币拿到了宫殿出入证。虽然看起来像贿赂，不过至少可以进宫里了……

string.name: name
string.value: 王妃的化妆品

把#t4000332#送给了#p2101007#，她看起来非常满意。好像其他地区的精灵都不化妆，为什么只有她化妆呢，搞不明白。

string.value: 智由拉的姐姐
#b#m260000000##k 村庄的少年#b#p2101001##k其实有一个姐姐。但 #p2101001#为什么一个人住呢？向#p2101001#问问吧。
#p2101001#有一个经常给他讲有趣故事的善良姐姐，但被宫殿的士兵抓去了。因为担心姐姐，#p2101001#托付我如果去宫殿的话，向他姐姐问好。好。 帮#p2101001#去宫殿看看吧。 \n\n啊。不过没问他姐姐的名字哦？不过感觉上我认识#b#p2101001#的姐姐#k？
经常给他讲有趣故事的， #p2101001#的善良姐姐，她果然是#p2101008#。

string.value: 姐姐的信

#p2101001#的姐姐 #p2101008#。就像#p2101001#担心姐姐一样，她也非常担心留在村庄的，年幼的弟弟。把她写的信传给 #b#p2101001##k吧。
#p2101001#收到 #p2101008#的信之后非常高兴。他可能很担心凶恶的王妃欺负姐姐。

string.value: 讲故事的人世赫拉
#b#m260000300##k里有，可以连续讲一千日新故事的人#b#p2101008##k。去见见她吧。
仅仅因为会讲很多故事而被强行拉到宫殿的#p2101008#。她在担心自己的故事会不会讲完。为了#p2101008#，去冒险岛中书籍最多的地方 #b#m222020000##k借点书吧。
给#p2040052#讲了#p2101008#的故事，他看起来很吃惊。

string.name: name
string.value: 向威兹借书

string.name: parent
string.value: 讲故事的人世赫拉
听完来龙去脉的 #p2040052#说可以给#p2101008#借书。但#m222020000#有法律规定，如果借出一部分书，要再装入同等数量的书……。如果把 #b#p2101008##k所知道的故事编成书不就可以了吗？
向#p2101008#传达了#p2040052#的意思，她笑着说她已经把自己所知道的故事写成书了，马上编成书籍给我。

string.name: name
string.value: 世赫拉的故事书

string.name: parent
string.value: 讲故事的人世赫拉
#p2101008#按照#p2040052#的意思，把她所知道的故事编成了书籍给我。好，把这个拿给#b#p2040052##k就可以了吧？去#b#m222020000##k。
#p2040052#看到 #p2101008#给的一叠纸张后，高兴地把自己的书给我了。有这些的话，#p2101008#不用再担心了吧…… 赶紧去#p2101008#吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 讲故事的人世赫拉

string.name: parent
string.value: 讲故事的人世赫拉
#m222020000#的 #p2040052#为了 #p2101008#准备了多本故事书。不知贪心的王妃什么时候欺负她，得赶紧去#b#m260000000##k，把书拿给#b#p2101008##k吧。
拿到书的#p2101008#长舒了一口气。这些书可以撑一段时间了…… 可怜的#p2101008#…… 什么时候王妃会给她自由呢？

string.name: name
string.value: 爱玫瑰的小王子

string.name: parent
string.value: 为了小王子
尼哈沙漠上有一位奇怪的少年。与沙漠很不协调的衣着，与沙子颜色相仿的金发…… 去#b#m260010500##k与他说说话吧。
奇怪的少年正在担心他那枯萎的玫瑰。玫瑰？比起花，我倒更担心坐在这种地方的你…… 为了少年的玫瑰去找#b#t2022155##k吧。 \n\n#i2022155# #t2022155# #b#c2022155##k/5
为奇怪的少年找了#t2022155#。少年放心地轻声笑着。这个少年到底是谁呢？为什么在这种地方呢？

string.name: name
string.value: 爱星星的小王子

string.name: parent
string.value: 为了小王子
拿着玫瑰，坐在沙漠中央的少年。不顾及自己是否口渴，一直在担心玫瑰的少年…… 他还好吗？去找找看吧。
奇怪的少年呆呆地看着天空，沮丧地说看不到星星…… 星星？ 想看星星吗？ 看到略显悲伤的少年，我答应他去抓#r#o2100108##k，取能看到星星的#b#t4000333##k给他。 \n\n#i4000333# #t4000333# #b#c4000333##k/20
找了#t4000333#送给了奇怪的少年。他兴奋地笑了。少年说星星是他的故乡…… 什么意思呢？外星人？虽然不能理解，但是看到少年的笑脸还是很高兴。

string.name: name
string.value: 回收小王子童话书1

string.name: parent
string.value: 回收小王子的童话书
以前遇到的，坐在尼哈沙漠的少年，据说#b#m222020000##k的 #p2040052#对他有所了解…… 去找#b#p2040052##k吧。
向#p2040052#说明了尼哈沙漠少年的故事，他惊讶地说，少年是赫丽奥斯塔裂痕中弹出的童话中的人物。不能让感到孤独的#p2101006#一个人待在沙漠里，#p2040052#说要回收#p2101006#童话书。
在尼哈沙漠找到了#p2101006#。脑海中浮现出少年孤独的脸庞…… 说什么好呢，怎样才能让童话恢复呢。

string.name: name
string.value: 回收小王子童话书2

string.name: parent
string.value: 回收小王子的童话书
向#p2101006#问了关于狐狸的事，他看起来一无所知。怎么办…… 犹豫了一会，突然灵机一动，我向#p2101006#许诺，可以成为他的朋友。他笑着点了点头。并且拿出了小王子童话书。把这个拿给#b#p2040052##k就行了。
听到与#p2101006#成为了朋友，#p2040052#放心地说了声谢谢。这样#p2101006#童话书中的混乱应该结束了吧？成为了童话的一部分…… 感觉很奇妙哦。

string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?! 1

string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?!
#b#m260000000##k 村庄外的 #b#p2101012##k…… 也许他是#m260000000#的秘密组织沙子图团？去找找吧。
#p2101012#说自己是沙子图团员，需要我帮他找必要的材料，去盗窃王妃的宝物。用#b#t4000329##k制绳子，赶紧去抓#r#o2100102##k吧。\n\n#i4000329# #t4000329# #b#c4000329##k/30
给#p2101012#送去了#t4000329# 30个。虽然不是什么大事，但希望可以帮到沙子图团。

string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?! 2

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?!
#b#m260000000##k村庄外的#b#p2101012##k。他是#m260000000#的秘密组织，沙子图团团员。沙子图团为村庄居民做了很多事，不知能不能帮帮他们？
#p2101012#说盗取王妃宝物时需要毒针，希望可以找到材料#b#t4000330##k。为了沙子图团，赶紧去办吧。 \n\n#i4000330# #t4000330# #b#c4000330##k/50
给#p2101012#找来了所有#t4000330#。沙子图团需要找的东西真多啊，真是辛苦……

string.name: name
string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?! 3

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙子图团员的请求?!
为了#m260000000# 村庄居民而努力的沙子图团。能为他们做点什么呢？#b#m260010400##k的#b#p2101012##k据说是沙子图团员，去找找他吧。
#p2101012#说这次一定要盗取王妃的宝物，要去#b宫殿#k。不能让王妃发现，得避开王妃和宫殿内的警卫，利用#b宫内的隐蔽的入口#k，小心翼翼地拿来王妃装饰柜中的#b戒子#k。不过之前为什么要做毒针和绳子呢？看起来没什么用哦？\n\n#i4031578# #t4031578# #b#c4031578##k/1
把盗来的戒子给了#p2101012#。呼～ 完成任务了。但是……这种事情不是应该由经验丰富的团员亲自做吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 西琳的证词

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙子图团和红蝎子团
#b#m260010400##k的#p2101012#。他好像发火了…… 宝物都拿给他了，还有什么事呢？
#p2101012#说把盗取的宝物藏到了岩石后头，结果被谁给偷走了。据他描述盗走宝物的人是舞姬#p2101000#。去找#b#p2101000##k吧。
盗走宝物的人好像的确是#p2101000#。但听到#p2101000#的话，好像有些奇怪？

string.name: name
string.value: 真假

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙子图团和红蝎子团

#p2101000#说宝物是欺负居民的红蝎子团的，所以拿回来给了人们。什么？那#p2101012#是红蝎子团的人？但他说他是沙子团团员啊……
#p2101000#说 #p2101012#是假的，他周边一定有红蝎子团的据点，去那儿找找。进入洞口需要特殊的暗号，把宝物拿来放在居民家的话，可能会被报复…… 但是已经知道暗号又是什么意思呢？

把宝物放在用O标示的家中。这应该算是对红蝎子团的有力的报复吧……

string.name: name
string.value: 秘密组织的存在
以#t4011008#产地而闻名的#b#m260000000##k。但是#m260000000#的人们看起来不是很富有。据说都是因为#m260000000#的王妃…… 在村子中央跳舞的舞姬，#b#p2101000##k可能知道关于王妃的传闻？
向#p2101000#询问了王妃的事情，她透露了很多对于王妃的不满， 也提到了#b沙子图团#k。沙子图团是把贪心王妃的宝石盗取，分给人们的秘密组织。好帅的侠盗啊。#p2101000#听到要加入沙子图团，犹豫了一下之后说找到写有#b沙子图团的墙#k就能了解他们。找到墙之后再去找#b#p2101000##k。
找到了有沙子图团标志的墙。仔细看好像有关于沙子图团的提示…… 这个提示是铁锤，短刀，弓？什么意思呢？

string.value: 拥有弓的男子

string.name: parent
string.value: 阿丁所说的沙子图团

看起来很迟钝，而且有大肚子，但#p2101003#很强。但毕竟在对决中获胜了，现在可以成为沙子图团员了吧？#p2101003#说要成为沙子图团员的话，还要获得其他两个成员的认可。这么说来#p2103001#上除了铁锤还有弓和弓箭，短剑等词汇啊？

#p2101002#说沙子图团员要怀着对王妃的憎恨和愤怒，但不能把它表现出来。对于团员来说最重要的是耐性。耐性…… 这个和提炼有联系。就按呃拉斯卡说的，提炼#b#t4011008# 2个#k吧。\n\n#i4011008# #t4011008# #b#c4011008#/2

string.name: name

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: 对于善行的适当的补偿
被声称沙子图团的红蝎子团骗，反而帮了红蝎子团。幸好及时发现并把红蝎子的宝物分给了村子里的人，现在心安理得了…… 但不知为什么#b西琳#k还有话要说……
西琳说做了这些事早已弥补了帮助红蝎子团的事件，可以适当的要求些#b补偿#k。补偿？是谁给补偿呢？
作为善行的补偿，拿了几个宝物箱中的宝物。嗯，这个算是适当的补偿吧。

string.name: name
string.value: Sejan's Good Habit
#b#p2101011##k in #b#m260000200##k seems to be in some kind of trouble... I should go pay him visit.

I met with #b#p2101011##k. He said because he hadn't been feeling good, he didn't collect his arrows for a week and now he has lost some. I promised #b#p2101011##k that I would collect and bring him back all his missing arrows. But I didn't know it was that many. How many arrows does #b#p2101011##k shoot everyday? \n I thought I heard somewhere that they sell #b#t02060001##k in either #r#m220000000##k or #r#m222000000##k...

#b#p2101011##k started practicing shooting arrows again. I wanted to ask #b#p2101011##k how many arrows he shoots on average in one day... but he looked so focused as he was training to fight against the queen, I felt like I shouldn't bother him.

string.name: name
string.value: Jiyur's Palace Entry Pass

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search for His Sister
#b#p2101001##k says he is going to see his sister. I'm worried since he's just a kid. Maybe I should go see him.

I didn't really believe it when #p2101001# said he was going inside the palace to see his sister... The plan #p2101001# thought of was to buy #b#t04031582##k from #b#p2101004##k. Since I already said I would pay for it knowing that #p2101001# has no money... I guess I need to keep the promise now.\n\n#i04031582# #t04031582# #b#c04031582##k / 1

#p2101001# looked so happy when he received the #b#t04031582##k ... Then just like that, he ran off to the palace. I'll have to ask him later if he was able to meet his sister. But... was he supposed to write his name on the #t04031582#? I've never heard of that before.

string.name: name
string.value: Dealing with Tigun

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search for His Sister

I feel bad for #p2101001#. He really wanted to get in the palace... I should step in and try to convince #b#p2101004##k. A fine of #b50000 mesos#k... I'll pay it off instead and ask for him to let #p2101001# to meet his sister.\n\n#b50000 mesos#k

It is unfortunate that #p2101001# wasn't able to meet his sister but it's good to know that they can at least send and receive letters from each other. But, #p2101004#! Don't you think the delivery fee is a bit ridiculous?

string.name: name
string.value: The Tree Cutter's Test
#b#p2071011##k in #b#m222010102##k is looking for me? That's strange. What does he want with me...?

I spoke with #p2071011#. He saw that I come here often, so he wanted to tell me to stay away from this dangerous place. But, seriously? He's afraid to walk around the forest because of #o5100003#? If I don't convince #p2071011# that I'm strong enough to handle myself here, he might physically drag me out of #m222000000#. I better hurry up and prove it to him!

#r30 minute time limit
#k#o5100003# #r#a39511##k
#p2071011# was amazed that I was able to hunt all the #o5100003# in such a short time. But after all that work, all I got was permission to freely roam around the forest... Wonderful...

string.name: name
string.value: 沙子图团的悬赏通缉

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙漠的悬赏通缉
给沙漠造成威胁的仙人掌怪物#r#o3220001##k！为了阻止#o3220001#，#b沙子图团#k设下了悬赏金。沙子图团？询问详细的情况时，#p2101000#却卖起了关子，说如果想知道详细的情况，就直接去问#b沙子图团的团长#k……沙子图团……哼……
见到了沙子图团的团长#p2101010#。#p2101010#说因为不能放着危险的#o3220001#不管，所以设下了赏金，但是有一个问题……生活在沙漠里的人之中，有些人认为#o3220001#不是怪物，而是沙漠的守护神，反对这次行动。因此让我去说服他们之中的代表#p2100001#……

string.name: name
string.value: 说服莫哈莫德

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙漠的悬赏通缉
找到#p2100001#之后，他说不允许讲#o3220001#是怪物什么的。看来反对的意见还是比较强烈的嘛……？要想说服他，必须先让他消消气。搜集#p2100001#喜欢的#b1个#t4011008##k给他的话，就应该可以和他对上话了吧？\n\n#i4011008##t4011008# #b#c4011008#/1
终于说服了#p2100001#！真是个固执的人，费了好大的力气，但总算是说服了。好吧……！回去向#p2101010#报告这一情况吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 消灭大宇

string.name: parent
string.value: 沙漠的悬赏通缉
想方设法说服了#p2100001#。快去向#p2101010#报告这一事实吧。
听说说服了#p2100001#之后，#p2101010#露出了满意的微笑，点了点头，然后让我去消灭#r#o3220001##k，就像这是理所当然的事情一样。说服就已经很困难了，还要去消灭怪物？呼～不过总算还有赏金，快去消灭怪物吧。\n\n#k#o3220001# #r#a39541##k
消灭了#o3220001#后，向#p2101010#进行了报告。#p2101010#开心的哈哈大笑，说做得好。……嗯？这就结束了吗？赏金呢？！#p2101010#很肯定地告诉沙子图团员，没有赏金。

string.name: name
string.value: 寻找疑问的金字塔……
在#e阿里安特后街#k研究沙漠居民的生活的文化学者#e巴一岚#k说最近在沙漠中有了新的发现。去见见巴一岚。\r\n#bTip在天空之城搭乘开往阿里安特的飞艇，可以到达尼哈沙漠的绿洲阿里安特。
在阿里安特地区从事研究工作的文化学者巴一岚说最近在阿里安特通往玛加提亚的沙漠中，在一次规模巨大的沙尘暴之后，有一座#e#b身份不明的金字塔#k#n露了出来。他说他正在寻找探险家，对这个充满了疑团的金字塔进行调查。为了揭开金字塔的秘密，先去沙哈地带3见见金字塔前面山丘上的#e#b杜阿特#k#n。
接受了在阿里安特研究沙漠民族文化的文化学者巴一岚的委托，前往沙哈沙漠，对最近一次沙尘暴之后出现的巨大的金字塔进行调查。站在金字塔入口处的杜阿特警告了金字塔的危险性，说如果是不怕死的勇士的话，可以继续挑战……

string.name: name
string.value: Rooney's Breaking News
#b#p9250052##k is apparently handing out flyers that contain the breaking news...
Just received a flyer from #b#p9250052##k. The flyer stated that Happyville is in a state of emergency, and for more details, I have to visit #p1022101#.
I asked #b#p1022101##k to inquire more on the stuff written on the flyer.

string.name: name
string.value: News Special Report
People are saying that there is shocking news on the front page of the Maple Herald. What could it be?

You were unable to buy the newspaper because it was already sold out. However, you were able to read from the newspaper clippings behind the sales clerk. They say that Santa Claus will not be coming to Maple World this year. Is it true that he's not coming to town because Maplers stopped believing in Santa Claus? There must be some other reason. #bRooney#k is from Happyville and should know about what's happening. You should go ask.
You wished Rooney a Merry Christmas! Now, you should ask about Santa Claus.

string.name: name
string.value: Disappeared Santa Encyclopedia
You should ask Rooney about the article on Santa Claus.

Rooney felt bad that most Maplers don't believe in Santa Claus anymore. She also mentioned that this is caused by the loss of #bSanta Encyclopedias#k in the town library. She asked that you gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias that the monsters have stolen. Remember, not only is it meaningful to gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias, but also something good will happen while searching for those books.

#t4161043# #b#c4161043##k/1 
#t4161038# #b#c4161038##k/1 
#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1 
#t4161040# #b#c4161040##k/1 
#t4161041# #b#c4161041##k/1 
#t4161042# #b#c4161042##k/1

Just like Rooney had mentioned, a lot of good things happened to you while searching for the 6 Santa Encyclopedias. Since you did all those good deeds, Santa is certainly coming to town. More importantly, Maplers will now believe in Santa Claus!

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Grandmother Finding

You've found Santa Encyclopedia No.2, regarding Santa's Family History. Santa Encyclopedia No.2 has stories about the lovely wife of Santa Claus, Mrs. Claus. You should visit her by tracing the information written in Santa Encyclopedia No.2.
Mrs. Claus was precisely at the location mentioned in the book. You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus.
You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus, but she pretended as if she didn't know who he was. How will you get her to warm up to you?

string.name: name
string.value: Common Sense Of Santa

You made a visit to Mrs. Claus wondering about Santa Claus's condition, but she wouldn't tell you anything. Maybe you should go find #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, the one that contains the history of Santa Claus, and read up a bit first. Then you should go visit her again.
Thanks to #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, she finally opened up and started talking to you.
Truth always prospers! You were able to discover the real reason why Santa Claus disappeared.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Creation Recipes

Mrs. Claus, who previously wouldn't open up about Santa Claus, finally started talking to you after realizing you had read up on Santa Claus. As you expected, there was another reason behind Santa Claus leaving.

Mrs. Claus told you about the importance of the Christmas Socks. However, she also said that making quality socks is not an easy task. The sock factory ceased its production due to a case of robbery, but she'll be able to make them again with a little bit of your help.\n\n#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1

You brought #bSanta Encyclopedia No.3#k to Mrs. Claus who was having a hard time remembering how to make Christmas Socks. But it all came back to her after reading the book. You should wait a while until she finds the frame for the socks.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Actual Creation Action
Mrs. Claus has finally discovered the frame for the socks. You should ask her again.

Mrs. Claus gladly lent you a frame necessary for making Christmas Socks. She also said that yarn with good flexibility is a must. These yarns seem to have been taken by the #bSnowman#k who is highly suspected as the culprit behind the robbery. You can make socks by collecting the yarn and attaching them to the sock frame.\n\n#t4220022# #b#c4220022##k/1
Finally, you made the Socks by getting the necessary amount of yarn. Of course, don't forget to thank Mrs. Claus who taught you the craft.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Hanging
You've successfully completed the Socks. Mrs. Claus thinks that Santa Claus will be satisfied with them. Now, you must hang the socks in a good location so that it will be seen easily by Santa Claus.

You've found a Christmas tree where you can hang the socks. This tree must be the one that Santa Claus used to visit whenever he was worried. Obviously, this is not a normal tree since it can talk! The tree tells you that doing good deeds will allow you to receive better gifts from Santa. You should go around town to see if there is anything you can do to help.\n\n#t4031885# #b#c4031885##k/4
You've helped the people in Happyville and also received a present from Santa Claus. Here's hoping that everyone will have a Merry Christmas!

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
There is an old man looking sad on the 2nd floor of center tower in Happyville. It must be hard to just pass him by, knowing that he is sad. Go find him and offer him some help.

#bCliff#k has been feeling lonely ever since Torr left to help Santa Claus. You will need to go to the highest point in town to take a picture of #bTorr#k pulling Santa's sleigh.\n\n#t4031881# #b#c4031881##k/1
What?! #bTorr#k is not in the sleigh formation. Rumor has it that there is a Reindeer crying around the corner of town. Could it be #bTorr#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Torr's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
You took the picture as Cliff had requested, but Torr was not there! Cliff began to worry greatly about Torr. Let's listen to his unfinished story.

Cliff asked you to check if the reindeer crying around the corner of Happyville is Torr. And if it is, he asked you to #btell Torr#k that he will be waiting on the 2nd floor at the Center Tower of Happyville.
You've sent Torr back to lonely old man Cliff. It will be a warm and happy holiday, at least for those two.

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Cat's request

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney
#b#p9201030##k, who is planning on extensive chimney cleaning, needs some help. #b#p9201030##k should be somewhere around the Chimney in Happyville. You should find out.
You met Santa Kitty #b#p9201030##k in Happyville, who asked you to find Rina#b#p1010100##k in Henesys in order to borrow a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight to be used for cleaning the Chimney.
You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight from Rina#p1010100#k in Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery of Rina cleaning device

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney

You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and Flashlight from #p1010100#k. Let's take them to #b#p9201030##k in Happyville.

#t4031882# #b#c4031882##k/1 
#t4031883# #b#c4031883##k/1
You brought #b#p9201030##k a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight. He thanked you and asked for permission to clean the Chimney.

string.name: name
string.value: Warm Milk Delivery

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
Dalphs#b#9220005##k in Happyville has a favor to ask of you.
You met with Dalphs#b#p9220005##k in Happyville. He asked if you could bring a glass of warm milk to #bIcarus in Kerning City#.\n\n#t4031884# #b#c4031884##k/1
You delivered a glass of warm milk to Icarus#b#p1010100##k in Kerning City.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery the word Thank

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
You delivered a glass of warm milk to #b#p1052106##k. Hope he can go to bed early from now on. You should tell #b#p9220005##k in Happyville about this delivery, as he was worried.
You told Dalphs#b#p9220005##k that the glass of warm milk was successfully delivered to Icarus.

string.name: name
string.value: Bicho's snowman
Bicho in Happyville looks too weak to make a snowman all by himself, but he is doing quite well so far. But it seems like he is looking for someone.
Bicho asked you to find the person who helped him make the snowman. He said that the person is somewhere in Maple World.\n\nHis friend's name is #b#Q4490##k
Due to Bicho's misunderstanding, you were not able to find the Mapler who had helped him earlier. Wait, Bicho is thinking of another name now? You should go visit him!

string.name: name
string.value: 清理垃圾
我要去新加坡机场见一见#b#p9270039##k。她会说一些跟我们美丽的新加坡有关的事情。

她让我打扫新加坡的街道。她在新加坡机场工作，因此听到很多老外抱怨，说这个城市已经今非昔比了。我应该清理垃圾，重新在国外游客心目中树立新加坡的良好形象。

#t4000366# #r#c4000366# / 20#k
#t4000367# #r#c4000367# / 20#k
我现在感觉好多了，为了让新加坡变得更加整洁，我作出了自己的贡献。

string.name: name
string.value: 拦住他们！
我们去中心商务区找#b#p9270028##k吧！

#b#p9270028##k让我去收集#b#t4000369#和#t4000370##k，这样一来新加坡儿童就可以更加安全地四处走动。看来，有些人就是不遵从规则啊，不是吗？我应该帮助#p9270028#，让新加坡变得更好。

#t4000369# #r#c4000369#/100#k
#t4000370# #r#c4000370#/100#k
在帮助#p9270028#之后，我觉得在中心商务区走动更加安全了。希望所有的儿童都有同样的感想！

string.name: name
string.value: 拦住超速者！
中心商务区的#p9270028#对不断增长的超速违章感到十分担心。我们去找他，看看中心商务区到底是什么情况！
我感觉非常好，为了让新加坡变成一个更好、更安全的居住城市，我作出了自己的贡献。

string.name: name
string.value: 技术任务
听说中心商务区的#b#p9270029##k病了。我应该去看一看他到底是怎么回事。

#p9270029#让我去收集一些学校作业必须要用的物品。他为什么会让我这么做？他看起来病得没这么严重啊！算了，我这次还是好心帮他一次吧。但下不为例。我们动手收集这些物品吧，然后交给#p9270034#。

#t4000374# #r#c4000374#/2#k
#t4000375# #r#c4000375#/6#k
#t4000376# #r#c4000376#/1#k
我将#p9270029#所需的物品交给了#p9270034#。希望我生病的时候他也能这样帮我！

string.name: name
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰 1

string.name: parent
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰
我刚才看到了一位时尚女性，中心商务区的#p9270032#朝我招手呢！我真的这么有魅力？
我把所有需要的物品交给了#p9270032#，从来没见过对自己的时尚如此着迷之人。说到时尚，东南亚彩虹岛中没有一个人的着装能比得上我的。

string.name: name
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰 2

string.name: parent
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰
对时尚着迷的#p9270032#又一次寻求帮助。这次是要帮什么忙呢？

她绝对痴迷时尚！她还想要一套衣服。她衣柜中到底有多少衣服啊。她是时尚模特还是其他什么吗？不过，还是把她想要的给她吧。

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/25#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/25#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/5
安吉为了感谢我帮她收集新衣服的必备物品，送给了我一份胡萝卜蛋糕。看起来美味极了。

string.name: name
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰 3

string.name: parent
string.value: 安吉心爱的服饰
什么？中心商务区的#p9270032#又要找我？这次又回事什么事情啊！
唉…#p9270032#终于找到了她想要的所有衣服！可要说时尚的话，我相信自己更胜一筹！

string.name: name
string.value: 过去的秘密

string.name: parent
string.value: 幽灵船的秘密
驳船码头的#b#p9270030##k似乎需要我的帮助。他对某件事物好像非常个恐惧。我们去一探究竟吧。

#p9270030#跟我讲了奇怪的鬼故事及海岸线沿岸的幽灵船。我该相信他吗？他只是城镇中的无名流浪汉。但他讲故事的态度非常严肃。我们去看一看他说的是否属实。驳船码头应该有#b#o9420509##k和#b#o9420510##k，我要消灭它们！

#o9420509# #r#a45101##k
#o9420510# #r#a45102##k
太令人吃惊了！#p9270030#说的居然是真的！我要再去找他，因为我觉得他还有更多故事。

string.name: name
string.value: 前往海洋

string.name: parent
string.value: 幽灵船的秘密
#b#p9270030##k还知道更多秘密！咱们再去找他一次！

#b#p9270030##k告诉我说他希望自己可以和船员们再次扬帆起航。不过，由于海岸线上幽灵的存在，他不知道是否能够像以前一样出海了。我希望能够帮他，消灭#b#o9420510#和#o9420511##k，让他重返大海。

#o9420510# #r#a45111##k
#o9420511# #r#a45112##k

把#t4032056#交给了#p9105002#，并收到了礼物。好像每天只能参加一次，有什么其他的方法可以再次参加今天的活动吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 都会丛林
新叶城里有一个蒙面人... 他的交易条件是什么？
我和蒙面杰克交谈过，他是一个侠盗王子。他爱上了公主，并且正设法从远方赢得她的爱。他非常憎恨机械蜘蛛，因为正当她要亲吻他的时候，被一只机械蜘蛛咬了。因此，我答应追捕到100 只机械蜘蛛来换取他的感激以及某项他所挑选的特殊物品。我应该会在 内部齿轮装置之中发现牠们...\n\n#o9400545# #r#a49121##k
我消灭了100 只讨厌的机械蜘蛛，并且从蒙面杰克那里收到了五个叶片水晶的报酬。 只要我想，每72 小时都可以回来帮助他。

string.name: name
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物 - 发现

string.name: parent
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物
我听说在大笨钟底下的内部齿轮装置上有一个探险家。哪里隐藏了什么奥秘之处呢？我得查清楚！
我和世界知名的寻宝公司的强 贝瑞加德交谈过。跟他谈到了苏白尼，传说中负责整个枫之世界黑暗卷轴的巫师。他相信在内部齿轮装置内有某些东西可能是他的宝藏。我答应帮助清除道路。我必须要击败#b50 只杀人虎头蜂、30朵巨灵食人花和40 头火焰象#k，我就能更深入内部齿轮装置探险…
我清出了一条直接通向内部齿轮装置的路，现在可以在哪里安静地探险。当我准备好的时候，就可以见到强 贝瑞加德继续这次冒险的下一个阶段！

string.name: name
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物 - 侵入

string.name: parent
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物
强 贝瑞加德正在等我！他已经有所发现了！
我和强交谈过，他在内部齿轮装置中发现了一组他无法破解的神秘符文。他提到需要名为#b翻译水晶#k的特殊水晶。我答应捉 #b50#k 个给他用来破解符文。电击象…强认为牠们头上的机制内可能有翻译水晶。
我拿到了 #b50个强所需要的翻译水晶#k，他正在努力破解那些符文。我必须快点回来看看他是否已经完成！

string.name: name
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物 - 释出

string.name: parent
string.value: 苏白尼的遗物
强已经完成译码这些符文了！我现在必须回到他那边！
强和我再度交谈，并且有意外事件发生。我将必须去搜寻内部齿轮装置地图片让他能汇集成地图！他提到了那些他「借来」帮忙的机器人发疯了，不停地说「#b我是机器人#k」 因为它们匆匆走入了克兰卡丛林... 最好小心 - 我可不想被吓到！
终于完成了！我把这些碎片带回去给强，他开始拼成地图。不过，他的确偶然看到了一个奇怪的戒指，转交给我。 如果这是第一个宝物，我想知道其余的在哪里...

string.name: name
string.value: 迷失了！
新叶城中有一位神秘的旅客 -他看起来不像是这附近一带的人。我应该问他发生了什么事。可能会很有趣...
我和艾尔潘 葛拉博交谈过，他是来自于冒险岛的异世界的旅客。 他旅行至此地观察我们和我们的庆典，但是他却在新叶城迷失了方向。我答应透过向白外星人卫兵收集 #b30 艾尔潘磁石#k帮助他回家。我并不知道有一个异世界存在 …我想知道那里是否有酷似我的人... 。
我取得了#b30 艾尔潘 磁石#k并且还给艾尔潘。他送我一瓶艾尔潘药水作回报，某种一定可以帮助我的东西。虽然他看起来比较需要帮助...

string.name: name
string.value: 重回异世界
艾尔潘已经调整了他的指南针，但他仍然需要我帮忙。我应该回去看看他需要什么！
我回去找艾尔潘得到更多讯息，他解释当他能够调整指南针的时候，必须回到旅行差错的时间点，让他可以平安回家。我必须搜寻#b60个时光手表#k并把他们交出来。而且对他的回程来说是完美的旅程。闹钟啾啾应该会有，因为他们有收集时间的倾向。哈！
#b60个时光手表#k 我全都拿到了并且将它们还给了艾尔潘。他把发现的一个非常精致奖励送给我作为回报…！

string.name: name
string.value: 轻量级选手
艾斯比亚德看起来需要我帮忙。我最好去新叶城拜访他！
我和艾斯比亚德交谈过，他很高兴看到我。他曾试图建造新区域，但是狮鹫兽一直对建筑工程队造成大混乱。要是还不够的话，那些讨厌的黄色炸弹球也正在攻击机器。我答应帮忙除掉 #b100 狮鹫兽#k和 #b150 #t4000391##k #b黄色炸弹球#k让他们知道这个城市是禁区！
老兄，好累的一天。我拔掉了狮鹫兽爪子并拆除了黄色炸弹球的雷管。现在这座城市可以平静地继续建造了。艾斯比亚德认为他们也许会再行动，所以我必须回来看他们是否在喧闹...

string.name: name
string.value: 清除街道
新叶城中来了一位新警长。我应该去看看是谁！
我见过那位新警长，莉塔 罗莉丝。她是艾斯比亚德老朋友其中之一，接任为新警长。我答应帮忙她整顿这个城镇，透过消灭新叶城内的 #b200只电击象以及200只狮鹫兽#k。我最好赶快开始！
我…我成功了！200只电击象和狮鹫兽已经阵亡在我的威力之下！ 除此之外，我从莉塔那得到一个酷道具作为「感谢」。从现在开始，只要我想，随时都可以回去帮助她…

string.name: name
string.value: 城市剑士
我是艾斯比亚德 史林姆，新叶城的市长。我要感谢您帮助我们让这个城市变得繁荣且持续经营。我有东西送给您，所以请立刻来找我！
艾斯比亚德送我一个剑士的王座作为帮助这个城市繁荣与持续经营的奖励！在未来的战斗中这绝对可以帮助我！
艾斯比亚德送我一个剑士的王座作为帮助这个城市繁荣与持续经营的奖励！在未来的战斗中这绝对可以帮助我！

string.name: name
string.value: 都市丛林 - 后续
新叶城里有一个蒙面人... 他的交易条件是什么？
我和蒙面杰克交谈过，他是来自艾莫瑞亚的侠盗王子。他爱上了公主，并且正设法从远方赢得她的爱。他非常憎恨机械蜘蛛，因为正当她要亲吻他的时候，被一只机械蜘蛛咬了。因此，我答应追捕到100 只机械蜘蛛来换取他的感激以及某项他所挑选的特殊物品。
我消灭了100 只讨厌的机械蜘蛛，并且从蒙面杰克那里收到了五个叶片水晶的报酬。 只要我想，每72 小时都可以回来帮助他。

string.name: name
string.value: 清除街道 - 后续
新叶城中来了一位新警长。我应该去看看是谁！
我见过那位新警长，莉塔 罗莉丝。她是艾斯比亚德老朋友其中之一，接任为新警长。我答应帮忙她整顿这个城镇，透过消灭新叶城内的 #b200只电击象以及200只狮鹫兽#k。我最好赶快开始！
我…我成功了！200只电击象和狮鹫兽已经阵亡在我的威力之下！ 除此之外，我从莉塔那得到一个酷道具作为「感谢」。从现在开始，只要我想，随时都可以回去帮助她…

string.name: name
string.value: 欢迎光临新叶城测验 - 结束

string.name: parent
string.value: 欢迎光临新叶城测验
我已经成功解答了所有的问题但是我仍然对某些事好奇...
我当时正与艾斯比亚德 史林姆谈话，而且马莱尼西亚岛和新叶城这片土地比我从这项测验中所学到的更丰富。我想要知道更多在这个地方发生过的事。
我已问过关于马莱尼西亚岛的古老传说，而艾斯比亚德 史林姆并未完全回答我的问题。或许等我变得更强的时候，他就会告诉我更多相关的事。

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

I visited the Glimmer Man, and discovered that he's an ultra-powerful mage whose ability to turn his entire body into pure diamond (hence his name) has allowed him to journey to space and other inhospitable environments. Through the vast knowledge he's acquired during his explorations, he's also become somewhat of a renowned weapons creator and arms dealer.\r\nThe Glimmer Man has landed in Masteria looking for something called #b#t4031760##k, a rare element from the alternate dimension of Versal he's been dying to experiment with. To thank me for recovering some and bringing it to him, he's promised to make me a weapon of my own from it. However, I've got to also track down #b7 #t4021008#s#k and return these to him as well. Only then can he reduce the naturally unstable Materia down to a useable form. A weapon made from an otherwordly material! I wonder what it does...

I returned to the Glimmer Man and he synthesized the #b#t4031760##k and the #b7 #t4021008#s#k I gave him to form a Materia Orb. He's said his precocious friend Spindle can turn this into a weapon, so I should see him when I'm ready to make the weapon...WOOT! Spindle is currently residing in the Omega Sector. Additionally, anytime I find more White Versal Materia, I can bring it to the Glimmer Man and he'll create another Materia Orb for me so I can make another weapon!

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia Continued

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia
