string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
偷走雨珠子的 #b波斯猫#k会在哪儿呢?
到#b波斯猫#k所在的地方跟它说话，可是听不懂它在说什么~!如果委托#b受伤的猫#k，能学到猫语吗?
跟#b受伤的猫#k学了猫语! 现在能听懂 #b波斯猫#k说的话吧?

string.name: name
string.value: 与波斯猫的交易

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
能听懂波斯猫的话… 听说要想从#b波斯猫#k那里要回 #b雨珠子#k，还要满足它的要求。
要正确回答波斯猫所提的全部问题!为了挑战问题还要带来 #b炸鸡 300个#k。
Now I must try to talk with the Boss Kitty to propose a deal for that Orange Marble...

string.name: name
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
收集#b炸鸡 300个#k， 正确回答全部的波斯猫所提的问题就可以得到雨珠子。 马上还给美代子。
将雨珠子安全地送给美代子。
Hmm, I could understand what he is saying. Well, time to make that trade proposal into action.

string.name: name
string.value: Upgrading Zakum Armor
Tsuri, the gregarious fish merchant, claims to have knowledge of the way to awaken the Zakum Armor's dormant power. I can't imagine this armor at its full strength. Such power!

According to Tsuri, in order to reawaken the dormant power, I'll have to eliminate #b20 Maladies#k and #b20 Wild Kargo's#k within the time limit. nnNo. of Maladies Left: #r#a80131##knNo. of Wild Kargos Left : #r#a80132##k

I tried on the Zakum Armor that has been reawaken by Tsuri. I can literally feel the armor's strength, coursing through my veins...as if the fearsome power of Zakum is mine to wield and control...I feel invincible wearing this. This is awesome!

string.name: name
string.value: 哭泣的美代子

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
去找哭泣的美代子。
跟哭泣的美代子说话。
美代子好像边哭边想说什么。

string.name: name
string.value: 用猫语与波斯猫对话

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
学了猫语，马上去找波斯猫好吗?

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping : Start

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I should meet Yoona at Southperry for a little quiz!
There's a quest before the quiz starts. I better take care of that fast.
I was able to safely obtain Beginner's Guide to Shopping at the Cash Shop.

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's 1st question on shopping.
What's the 1st question on Yoona's Quiz on Shopping? I have to remember if I want to get it right...
I learned something about expanding the inventory through Cash Shop. I can store extra equipment and items using this method!

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's 2nd question on shopping.
What's the 2nd question on Yoona's Quiz on Shopping? I have to remember if I want to get it right...
I learned something about avatar item equipment. I can obtain stylish decorations for my weapons, armor, face, hair at any time!

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's 3rd question on shopping.
Almost halfway done! Time to solve question number 3! I have to get it right...
I learned something about expiration dates. I can move my cursor over my acquired items and view the expiration date, so I know when I have to change style or re-select it!

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's 4th question on shopping.
I can see the light at the end of the tunnel--I'm nearly done! Time to solve question number 4!
I learned something about number of uses on an item. I can only use an item so such until it vanishes. At that point, I'll have to acquire another one if possible...

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's last question on shopping.
Last question. Gotta finish STRONG!
I learned something about the restrictions regarding the weapon avatar items. This should help me navigate through the Cash Shop with no problem whatsoever!

string.name: name
string.value: 阅读报纸
住在昭和村的勇助好像出什么事了。
在昭和村遇见了勇助。 他要我帮他找回#b#t1002418# 一个#k。 再帮一次忙吧? \n#t1002418##b#c1002418##k/1
把一个#t1002418##k 递给勇助。 没想到想读的内容是漫画??。

string.name: name
string.value: 蔬菜，太好了~!
听说最近昭和村里的蔬菜价格变得昂贵。为什么会这样?
听由美讲， 因为#b#o8140500##k的捣乱，把菜园弄的一团糟。这次可不能视若无睹! \n#t4000080##b#c4000080##k/200
清除#b#o8140500##k守住了昭和村人的菜园。 从现在起要多吃蔬菜。

string.name: name
string.value: 演员修炼
昭和村子的小岚不知有什么事，听说需要帮忙。
小岚的面试很成功。向电影明星之路迈出了成功的一大步。现在就剩去见黑泽导演的事了 。 出发吧!

string.name: name
string.value: 电影演员
世界有名的导演--黑泽说话。
最终的面试很简单。只要清除住在射手村里面的 #b#o6130101##k就可以了。 竭尽所能消灭它。 \n\n#o6130101##r#a80301##k
不会吧~! 这么快就拍好了? 早知道我就自己去面试了。不知她拍的怎么样…不会是在骗我吧?

string.name: name
string.value: Protect Lucas's Farm
It seems like the snails around Amherst are causing great grief around the area because of their actions on the farm. How can I help solve this problem, perhaps I should talk to Lucas!

The snails around Amherst has been causing great damage to farms in the area, and Lucas is really counting on me to come through for them. I'll have to take them out! 
#o100100# #r#a80311##k 
#o100101# #r#a80312##k 
#o130101# #r#a80313#
The snails are gone! Hopefully this will protect the farms for a little bit. Too bad the Work Gloves Lucas gave me smelled like old bananas and fish...yuck!

string.name: name
string.value: 碰碰战争
来自昭和村的嘉美似乎遇到了麻烦。趁着还有时间，我去看看吧。
我不知道碰碰战争到底是怎么回事，但为了削铅笔，我需要收集 #b30 #t04000110#s#k。我得赶快把它们收集起来交给嘉美。\n#t04000110# #b#c04000110##k/30
对了，那把塑料刀真的能削铅笔吗？算了，嘉美声称他明天会在碰碰战争中获胜，所以……

string.name: name
string.value: Youthful Mariwaka
Mariwaka of Showa Town apparently has great concern. I should at least listen to her and see what the fuss is about.

Mariwaka desired to keep her beauty eternal, and she found out about a potion that'll help her do so. Sounds very fishy, but since she really believes in it, I should get her #b50 #t04000149#s#k for her eternal beauty.\n#t04000149# #b#c04000149##k/50
I really doubt that those potions enable eternal youth. Oh well, she likes it anyways, and that's the bottom line. I'll just leave her be.

string.name: name
string.value: 玛雅的关切 1

string.name: parent
string.value: 玛雅的关切
对了，玛雅最近怎么样？我得去看看她！
伤口已经消毒，但小狮子需要休息。它似乎因为这一切而非常疲惫。

string.name: name
string.value: 玛雅的关切 2

string.name: parent
string.value: 玛雅的关切
小狮子的情况让我很担心。我得去玛雅家看看。
这药应该能在它好好睡一晚后排除体内的毒素。这样就可以了吗？我最好问问玛雅。

string.name: name
string.value: 玛雅的关切 3

string.name: parent
string.value: 玛雅的关切
我觉得我们已经迎来了转机。这就能解决问题吗？我需要问问玛雅。
为了加快小狮子的康复，玛雅让我帮忙收集一些鱼，必须是新鲜的。由于#b#o5400000##k喜欢吃新鲜鱼，我最好准备#b100 #t4000088#s#k。\n#t4000088# #b#c4000088##k/100
我在这里所能做的一切都已经完成。接下来就交给玛雅吧。希望小狮子能够早日康复！

string.name: name
string.value: 小狮子的项链 1

string.name: parent
string.value: 小狮子的项链
对了，小狮子最近怎么样？我得去玛雅家看看。
玛雅决定给小狮子打扮一下，用一条项链把它伪装成家猫。因为在当地商场买一条可能会暴露它的身份，所以她想让我去找明珠港的特奥帮忙。
特奥决定帮助制作小狮子的项链。

string.name: name
string.value: 小狮子的项链 2

string.name: parent
string.value: 小狮子的项链
特奥决定帮助制作小狮子的项链。我得赶紧问问他。
把材料交给特奥后，他很快就送去珠宝商那里制作。制作出来的是一条美丽的项链，使用了黑鳄鱼皮和龙皮。现在我得把这个展示给玛雅看看。

string.name: name
string.value: 小狮子的项链 3

string.name: parent
string.value: 小狮子的项链
把材料交给特奥后，他很快就送去珠宝商那里制作。这条美丽的项链由黑鳄鱼皮和龙皮制成。现在我得把它展示给玛雅看看。
有了这条项链，小狮子现在可一点也不像个怪物了。真是太好了！

string.name: name
string.value: 小狮子的旅程
小狮子现在和玛雅在外面玩吗？我得去玛雅家看看他们。
显然，给小狮子留下伤疤的是#b#o5130104##k，这也是它尽管戴着项链还是不敢离开家的原因。我需要准备#b100 #t04000051#s#k来增强它的信心。\n#t04000051# #b#c04000051##k/100
玛雅说小狮子的朋友们来过，并且和它一起离开了。至少小狮子不是一个人。虽然玛雅可能在哭，但我认为让小狮子去和朋友们生活是最好的选择。

string.name: name
string.value: 怪物传闻坊

string.name: parent
string.value: 怪物传闻坊
我听说埃尔纳斯的斯卡杜尔被怪物袭击了。我得去找他聊聊。
显然，狐狸，也就是珀斯上尉也遭遇了那个臭名昭著的怪物。我得去了解一下情况。
为了收集有关这个怪物的信息，我得帮珀斯上尉一个忙。你在开玩笑吗？

string.name: name
string.value: 狐狸真迷人

string.name: parent
string.value: 怪物传闻坊
为了收集有关这个怪物的信息，我得帮珀斯上尉一个忙。你在开玩笑吗？
为了进一步了解这个怪物，我需要给珀斯上尉#b50 #t04000129#s#k。\n#t04000129# #b#c04000129##k/50
难怪……他提到，地球防御总部似乎也在着手对付这个怪物。他说我可以通过偷听 马斯特将军 来了解更多情况。这可不容易……

string.name: name
string.value: 狼人

string.name: parent
string.value: 怪物传闻坊
难怪……他说，地球防御总部似乎也在积极行动以击败那个怪物。他提到我可以通过偷听 马斯特 将军 来了解更多情况。这可不容易……
不可能……其中一个#b#o8140000#s#k可能正在策划什么阴险的事情……我不能让他们在这里对无辜的人造成破坏。虽然这可能不是玛雅想听到的，但我必须消灭这些#b#o8140000#s#k。\n#t04000054# #b#c04000054##k/50
我没有找到戴着项链的#b#o8140000##k。我相信它肯定还活着某个地方。我知道这听起来有些奇怪，但我决定相信这个事实。

string.name: name
string.value: 勇助与美食
来自昭和村的勇助显然要做一个“奇妙的美食”。真是有趣……
勇助说，为了制作这个奇妙的美食，他需要 #b100 #t04000157#s#k。我迫不及待想看看会做出什么来！ #k#n#t04000157# #b#c04000157##k/100
美食？这不过是垃圾食品！*叹气*

string.name: name
string.value: 艾温和魔法密林
#m101000000# 的 #p1032100# 在返回 #m101000000# 的途中被怪物袭击了。自从那开始，她非常害怕去 #m101000000# 的外面冒险。想要我帮她关照一下那些怪物。是时候展示力量了！ \n\n#o1110100# #r#a80481##k
应 #m101000000# 的 #p1032100# 的要求，我除掉了在魔法密林周围游荡的 绿蘑菇。作为回报, #p1032100# 给了我一件精灵非常珍惜的宝物。它光彩夺目，看起来用于造作一些很特别的东西。

string.name: name
string.value: 美代子与她的海豹玩偶
来自昭和村的美代子似乎丢失了什么。我应该去找她谈一谈，帮她找回它！

我想她丢失的是从古木博士那里得到的 #b#t04000154##k。她把它掉在了河岸上，现在可能已经漂到大海里去了。
说起来，最近有个叫做 #b#o3230405##k 的怪物正在收集玩偶。我应该去看看……

#t04000154# #b#c04000154##k/100
呼，我尽量收集了尽可能多的玩偶。幸运的是，美代子找到了古木博士给她的那个。真是太好了！

string.name: name
string.value: An Unknown Love
An unknown lady in Kerning City spends yet another day shivering in coldness. I should hear her side of the story.
Am I even allowed to take these...? I do feel like helping her find true love though... Whoever that may be... well, these are dropped by #b#o7130300##k, alright. \n#t04000148# #b#c04000148##k/100
I surely wish she makes a good couple with that special someone. Hahaha...But then again, it's a little disturbing, come to think of it. I better ask her what's up next time.

string.name: name
string.value: Konpei's Gambit
Konpei is thinking on a way to take down the threat that so long has been endangering the region of Showa. Let's listen to what he has to say.

Konpei said that to finish this problem our only solution is to seize the evil from it's root. That said, it is advisable to #rparty up with other maplers#k to take down the Elite 3 of the Showa gang. As proof of the progress, he requested the drop of these 3 guys. The reward of this one better make up for it!
 
#t04000139# #b#c04000139##k/1 
#t04000140# #b#c04000140##k/1 
#t04000141# #b#c04000141##k/1

After an intense battle, the dominance of the Showa gang came to an end. As their chief has been taken down, the mob that long plagued the region started to dissipate. Wothy to mention the reward he gave to me was very, very welcome!

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
Olaf of Lith Harbor offered to take me to numerous famous spots in the Maple World.
According to Olaf, Riel will take me to the next stop. Where must that be?
I was able to meet up with Riel. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After soaking up the sun at Florina Beach, I should start up a conversation with Riel.
Riel offered to take me to Showa Town. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Skye...
I was able to meet up with Skye. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After taking a stroll around Showa Town, I should start up a conversation with Skye.
Skye offered to take me to Orbis. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Elma...
I was able to meet up with Elma. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After observing the stunning scenery of Orbis, I should start up a conversation with Elma.
Elma offered to take me to Ludibrium. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Marcel...
I was able to meet up with Marcel. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After I get done touring around Ludibrium, I should start up a conversation with Marcel
Marcel offered to take me to El Nath. Once I get there, he advised me to look for Scadur...
I was able to meet up with Scadur. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After observing the magnificent view of El Nath, I should start up a conversation with Scadur
Scadur offered to take me to Omega Sector. Once I get there, he advised me to look for Jr. Officer Medin...
I was able to meet up with Jr. Officer Medin. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After carefully observing Omega Sector, I should start up a conversation with Jr. Officer Medin.
Scadur offered to take me back to Lith Harbor. Once I get there, I better get back to Olaf...
I met up with Olaf again. What's this creepy scroll for...?

string.name: name
string.value: 美代子与她的泰迪熊
我应该去和 #b#p9120011##k 这个在警察局前面哭泣的人谈谈。
我给了 #b#p9120011##k #b50 #t04000106#s#k。她似乎很高兴收到这些。希望这对她修理玩偶足够了。

string.name: name
string.value: Doll in the Dark 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Doll in the Dark
#b#p1012109##k of #b#m100000000##k in Victoria Island has apparently started writing a book.
#p1012109# of #m100000000# has requested my help in writing his book. For more information, he recommended me to talk to #b#p2041022##k in #b#m220000400##k of Ludibrium. Should I go there...?
#b#p2041022##k asked me to look for some subjects worthy of writing a book on. I should talk to him when the research is over.

string.name: name
string.value: Doll in the Dark 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Doll in the Dark
#b#p2041022##k said he looked for some subjects that may go along with the book that's being written. What do I need to do now? I better ask him.
#p2041022# requested me to defeat #b#o6230400##k and collect #b50 #t04000143#s#k so I can hand them to #b#p1012109##k. I don't know if #p1012109# wants to be in on this, but I'll ask first.

Just the way #p2041022# ordered, I gathered up #b50 #t04000143#s#k from #b#o6230400##k, and gave them to #p1012109# of #m100000000#. #p1012109# seemed very ecstatic, and rewarded me for my effort, but will that really help him write the next chapter?

string.name: name
string.value: Soul in the Dark
I should ask #b#p1012109##k of #m100000000# how the book is coming along.

Just as I suspected, the stuff I gathered up for him last time didn't help much. This time, he wanted me to defeat #b#o6230500##k and gather up #b50 #t4000144#s#k for #p1012109# of #m100000000#.\n\n#t4000144# #b#c4000144#/50#k
I gave #p1012109# of #m100000000# #b50 #t4000144#s#k. Hopefully THIS will help me finish up the book.

string.name: parent
string.value: Soul in the Dark

string.name: name
string.value: The Ghost Whereabout

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
#b#p1012109##k of #b#p1012109##k's book should be ready by now. I should go talk to him.
Apparenlty the #b#t4000144#s#k have disappeared to the direction of #b#m801000000##k. I need to find it and return it to its original state.
Apparently, #p9120011#'s doll just went about on its one way. Maybe this has something to do with #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for...

string.name: name
string.value: A Puppet

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
Apparently #p9120011#'s doll just walked out and disappeared. I better check out this story.

#p9120011#'s doll apparently just walked out on her and disappeared. Maybe this has something to do with the #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for. I should go to #b#p1012109##k's place and talk to him.
#b#p1012109##k seems to catch on to something here.

string.name: name
string.value: The Man of Convention

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
#b#p1012109##k seems to catch on to something here. I'll need to hear this.

He said #p9120011#'s doll that is laden with #t4000144# may be controlled by something. I can't just stand still listening to this! I'll have to gather up #b50 #t04000148#s#k from #b#o7130300##k, as well as #b50 #t04000147#s#k from #b#o7130010##k. 
Since #p9120011# is crying, I'll have to return #b#t04000147##k to her first and hand #b#t04000147##k to her, then go to where #b#p1012109##k is.

#t04000148# #b#c04000148##k/50
#t04000147# #b#c04000147##k/50

After handing #b#t04000147##k to #p9120011#, a blinding light engulfted the dolls, and then they transformed back to their original state. Too bad #b#t04000148##k disappeared in the process. What should I do? I better go talk to #b#p9120011##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Ray of Light

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
After handing #p9120011# the doll, #b#t04000148#k also disappeared! #b#p9120011##k said she'll tell me a story...
#p9120011# suggested that I go to where #b#p1012109##k is and look for it. That's true, since standing pat doesn't do anything for me. I better go back and discuss this with him.

Apparently, #t04000148# and #t04000147# were both moved by warmth and compassion #p9120011# exudes. Isn't that nice to see? Just the way #p1012109# said, if everyone genuinely loves everything around them, then there would be no monster to begin with...? Anyway, it was nice to hear that #p1012109# may be ready to write the next chapter in the book. I'm can't wait~!

string.name: name
string.value: 勇助的特制海鲜 1

string.name: parent
string.value: 勇助的特制海鲜
来自昭和村的勇助似乎处于困境中。真想知道为什么……
如果能不潜水就能抓到鱼，那真不错，不过……算了，没关系。你应该可以从 #b#o3210450##k 身上拿到 #b#t04000153##k。\n\n#t04000153# #b#c04000153##k/1
能捕到一份可观的鱼真不错，不过……我得晚点回来看看情况如何。

string.name: name
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood
Now that Tsuri has #b#t04000153##k with him, will he be good at catching those fishes? I better go check him out...
Hah, I wound up having to catch for him. I'll need to get #b100 #t04000158#s#k from #b#o4230200##k.\n\n#t04000158# #b#c04000158##k/100
That bowl of rice covered in Poopa's eggs does not look enticing at all. Does it taste alright? I think I'll let others find out...

string.name: name
string.value: An Old Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
Kinokonoko of the Mushroom Shrine apparently found something. I should check it out.
Kinokonoko asked me if I could solve this puzzling code. What does this code mean...?
I managed to solve the code Kinokonoko gave me--answers lie in Sleepywood.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
After solving the code, I found out there's a clue in Sleepywood! I better go there immediately.
Based on the bizarre-looking statue in Sleepywood, I was enable to find another code. What would this code imply?
After solving the code written on the bizarre-looking statue, I headed over to a small grave.

string.name: name
string.value: The Meaning of the Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
Should I head over to the small grave that serves as the answer to the code written on the bizarre-looking statue? I should--knowing is better than not knowing.
Solving the code took me to this small grave. I better let Kinokonoko knowof this.
I told Kinokonoko everything I knew in regards to this puzzling code.

string.name: name
string.value: The Committee Challenges

string.name: parent
string.value: The Committee Challenges
Sabitrama of Sleepywood has been looking for me. Something must have happened. I should drop by when there's time.

Sabitrama found the clues needed for the 3rd Herb.
The message was still too hard to understand. The archive said something like this! ...
What kind of an ominous herb is this?? This herb cannot be placed near a human being, so seal up the force in a spherical object, and never let it see the day of light again...

If it's anything like the herbs before, then I'll still have to obtain this through monsters again. Arrgh, this is frustrating!

We found the 3rd Herb, but it is tightly sealed inside Lazy Buffy's Marble. It seems like it's been attached for so long, that I don't think we can just pluck it out of the sphere. Sabitrama then mentioned something like applying modern science to opening this. We've come so far, that there's no way we're about to give up.\nBut then again, who am I supposed to find?"

string.name: name
string.value: The Father of Modern Science

string.name: parent
string.value: The Committee Challenges

We found the 3rd Herb, but it is tightly sealed inside Lazy Buffy's Marble. It seems like it's been attached for so long, that I don't think we can just pluck it out of the sphere. Sabitrama then mentioned something like applying modern science to opening this. We've come so far, that there's no way we're about to give up.\nBut then again, who am I supposed to find?"

He may have talked too candidly on some things, but I think the herb can be plucked out of the marble. As part of the deal, I have to gather up #b500 #t04000133#s#k.


#t04000133# #b#c04000133##k/500

The seal is disabled, but since the marble itself isn't very stable, Dr. Kim made a device called "Open Sesami" and sent it to Sabitrama. I should go see him later. \nAnyway, he's pretty good at what he does, but man he's terrible at naming his inventions!

string.name: name
string.value: Open Sesami
The device known as "Open Sesame" should arrive at Sabitrama house any minute. I better go see him right now.
I'll need 1,000,000 mesos to open up "Open Sesami". I have a feeling that, even after making the investment, we may not get to touch the herb. Even with great hesitation, I must decide right now.

I think, as soon as the seal was disabled with the 3rd Herb, it perished the moment it touched the open air. Sabitrama seemed content with it, but ... I must admit, he's one heck of an enthusiast in terms of herbs. 1,000,000 mesos was a stiff price to pay, but I got the Magic Collection, so I'm good with that!

string.name: name
string.value: Umi Needs Money

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
I heard #r#p9120005##k of Showa Town is setting up a master plan. I better hear this.

She wanted to purchase a machine owned by #r#p2050002##k which is made out of the finest technology in the universe, but was short on money, so #r#p9120005##k asked me to pitch in for her. #n5,000,000 mesos is a LOT of money...
I handed #r#p9120005##k 5,000,000 mesos. Can she buy it, though?

string.name: name
string.value: Lazy Alien Grey

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
Apparently, #r#p9120005##k paid for the machine to #p2050002##k, only to keep waiting for the machine to come. #nIn any case, I better talk to #r#p9120005##k.
#r#p9120005##k asked me to convince #r#p2050002##k to send the machine to her. \nIn any case, I should meet up with #r#p2050002##k.
I was able to meet #r#p2050002##k. This is it!

string.name: name
string.value: The Arrogant Alien Gray

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
I better negotiate with #r#p2050002##k so the machine can be sent to Showa Town ASAP.

After eating lunch, #r#p2050002##k claims that he'll send the machine to Showa Town, no problem. \nThis really irritated me, but I'll have to gather up #b400#k #b#t4000117#s#k in order for that to happen.\r\n#t4000117# #b#c4000117##k/400
Just as #r#p2050002##k demanded, I got him #b400 #t4000117#s#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Good Luck

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
As promised, #r#p9120005##k sent this to #r#p9120005##k. I better go see it right now.
In order to create a new item, it'll require #b10#k #b#t4011005#s#k. \nI've gone through too much to give up on this. Let's go!\r\n#t4011005# #b#c4011005##k/10
I was able to make the item, but was this investment really worth it?

string.name: name
string.value: 波特的挑战
#r#p2050013##k 感觉精力充沛，以致于觉得自己可以做任何事情。嗯，这不会每天都发生，所以得去调查一下。
我不知道这是为了什么，但他想让我收集 #b#t4000102##k 和 #b#t4000078##k 各200个。他甚至答应给我一块宝石，帮助我一路前行。\r\n#t4000102# #b#c4000102##k/200\n#t4000078# #b#c4000078##k/200
一个有比锅盖还强大保护力的盾牌…… #r#p2050013##k 是认真的吗？还是在跟我开完笑？

string.name: name
string.value: 索非亚的点心
#r#p1022100##k 看起来很疲惫。
为了制作美味的 #r#t2010005##k ，她需要 #b20#k #b#t2012002#s#k。我需要去消灭木妖区域的怪物才能快速获取此物品。 \n#b#t2012002# #b#c2012002##k/20
收到了作为回报的 #r#t2010005##k 。味道好极了，感觉充满活力。

string.name: name
string.value: 透德的打猎方法
听说透德会告诉人们打猎方法
按照透德的打猎方法消灭了怪物。

string.name: name
string.value: 宠物的进化1
听说可以将宝贝龙加以进化！好像只有长相怪异的迦尔努斯，才知道这个传闻的真相……
真心疼爱宝贝龙而想要得到它的心，终于感动了迦尔努斯。

string.name: name
string.value: 宠物的进化2
证明了对宝贝龙的心意，但若想要让宝贝龙进化，需要一些特殊的材料…
为了让宝贝龙进化，需要将#b#t5380000##k 1个和10000金币交给迦尔努斯。
宝贝龙完成进化！转变成不一样的外貌了~

string.name: name
string.value: 宠物的再进化
若不喜欢目前龙的样貌，便可重新再尝试一次进化的过程！
为了再次进行进化，也和当初进化一样，需要#b#t5380000##k 1个和10000金币。
再进化成功了！变成了更符合期待的样貌了！

string.name: name
string.value: Ace of Heart's Secret Ability
#b#p2041017##k and his partner seems pretty busy recently. Should I check with them on what kind of business they are on now?
Ace of Hearts helped me make these scrolls... Geez, that was hard. It is repeatable within 3 days, huh?

string.name: name
string.value: Valentine's Day : Chocolate Basket
Apparently, Ace of Hearts can make a chocolate basket that extends the power of love using a number of #t4140100#s.

[#p2041017#] said with #t4140100# and additional materials, he can make a #b#t4140200##k that expires at a later date. Apparently, it's good for #r5 days#k, longer than that of #t4140100#.

#t4140100# #c4140100# / #r1#k
#t4031110# #c4031110# / #r1#k
#t4031109# #c4031109# / #r1#k
#t4031113# #c4031113# / #r1#k
#t4031114# #c4031114# / #r1#k
I was able to make a chocolate basket for the person I dearly love for the Valentine's Day through [#p2041017#].

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Artifacts

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ - Start
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!

I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to bring 10 #b#t4031664#s#k 10 #b#t4031665#s#k and 10 #b#t4031666##k to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Finding Jack
I heard that John Barricade has received news from his brother Jack! I should go find John in Bigger Ben and see what he's learned.

Apparently, Jack Barricade is in Masteria and has discovered Crimsonwood Keep deep in the Phantom Forest. However, the last letter John received from his brother was dated over a month ago. John wants me to head to Crimsonwood after him and see why Jack's communiques have stopped. Looks like I need to make my way through the Phantom Forest... I'd better stock up on potions!

I found Jack Barricade resting in a cave on Crimsonwood Mountain. It turns out that after exploring the Masterian wilderness for weeks, Jack finally came across the ancient stronghold - only it wasn't deserted. Jack was captured and imprisoned in the Keep by the evil soldiers I've been seeing around, but luckily managed to escape. John will be relieved that Jack is okay.

string.name: name
string.value: Translated Communique
I lost the translated communique, then Let's go to Elpam Gorlab!
I told Elpam Gorlab what I want.
I got the translated communique from Elpam Gorlab again. Thank You!

string.name: name
string.value: The Mark of Heroism

Lukan told me about the Valley of Heroes and the giant Menhir columns barring the way through. He mentioned that the Heroic Statues that line the valley would also act as teleporters, for only someone who had an artifact known as the Marker of Heroism. Perhaps someone well-versed in ancient artifacts would know something about these Markers of Heroism... I think I may have an idea on who to ask. Otherwise, it's time for some ledge hopping!

I was right: John Barricade's extensive knowledge about ancient civilizations and items has paid off again! He'll give me the Barricades' Marker of Heroism if I reimburse him for the materials they had to acquire to recreate it: #b1 Power Crystal#k, #b10 Gold Ores#k and #b4 Typhon Feathers#k. The only problem: Typhons nest in the upper reaches of the mountain! To get up the mountain, I'll have to go through the Valley first! Ugh! Looks like a catch-22! Hmmm, I guess I could see if someone else might have these feathers... I wonder if anyone else has already made it through the Valley on their own?

John gave me the Marker of Heroism artifact after I brought him the hard-to-find Typhon feathers and the other materials. Now I'll be able to the Heroic Statues to get through the Valley. However, it's not all candy and cake yet; I still need to figure out the correct statues to use, but at least it'll make it easier for me to move around. Guess I'll try each statue as I go along and see where they lead!

string.name: name
string.value: The Brewing Storm

I've heard tell that many travelers get lost in the spooky Phantom Forest. If I come across any of them, perhaps one of them will have an interesting tale to tell about the area. I should search them out, but I better make sure I don't become one of these lost travelers myself... yikes!

I met a knight lost in the Phantom Forest named #bLukan de Vrisien#k. His armor is very ancient-looking, and he seems to be from another era. Lukan asked if I knew anything about the unfriendly #bStormbreaker#k warriors wandering the forest. He seems to hate them, though strangely, his armor looks almost exactly like theirs... lightning bolts and all! Regarding this, Lukan remains tight-lipped... at least until I prove I'm not in league with them. To gain his trust, and prove my fighting prowess, I need to #bdefeat these Stormbreakers#k and #bcollect 10 of their badges#k to bring to him.

After defeating the Stormbreakers as he requested, Lukan explained that he is a #bStormcaster Knight#k from Crimsonwood Keep. When I told him that Crimsonwood Keep was ancient history, and that Masteria had been lost for a millenium, he seemed at a loss for words. Somehow, he has been transported to this time period, his future. Strange things are brewing indeed.

string.name: name
string.value: Storming the Castle

To enter the Grandmaster Hall of Crimsonwood Keep and find the new twisted Masters, Jack Barricade says I'll need to find some way to open the gate to the Keep's Inner Sanctum. Perhaps someone who has firsthand knowledge of the Keep will know what I need... and I know just who to ask!

I asked Lukan about the Inner Sanctum Gate, and as I surmised, he knew how to get in. Being a well-respected Stormcaster Knight, he was given a #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k by the Keep's Grandmasters. However, Lukan thinks that I'm mad to assault the castle and refuses to give me the key, calling it a suicide mission. However, if I can whittle down the Keep's defenders, he'll relent and give me the Keystone. I've already put the hurt on the Stormbreakers, but I'll need to defeat at least #b75 Windraiders, 75 Firebrands#k, and #b75 Nightshadows#k more to put a sizeable enough dent in this evil army!

I defeated the twisted Crimsonwood warriors! And true to his word, Lukan gave me his #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k. He also said that although the Keystone will physically unlock the Inner Sanctum Gate, the red energy field that surrounds them is foreign to him, and likely a new addition by the Keep's new Masters. I should take the key back to Jack Barricade and let him know what I've discovered.

string.name: name
string.value: 堕落之林
我听说在幻影森林中有一群强盗。或许他们就是导致旅客失踪的元凶。我想我应该调查一下，看看这个故事到底是真是假。
事实证明，这些所谓的强盗并没有对失踪事件负责，至少他们是这么说的。不过，我仍然不太明白他们为什么会在这片闹鬼的森林中扎营。他们的头领，一个名叫#b塔格林#k的神秘硬汉，对陌生人似乎很不友好。然而，塔格林提到我可以为他做一件事：#b砍倒被附身的幻影树#b，并给他带回#b50#k颗它们的#b种子#k。我不知道他为什么需要这些种子，但我想周围愤怒的树木越少，对大家都更好。
我完成了塔格林的请求，把幻影树的落种交给了他。他似乎因此对我有所软化，并向我开放了强盗营地。现在我可以从他们的供应商Mo那里进行买卖了。呼，这绝对省去了我再走一趟回到NLC的麻烦！

string.name: name
string.value: The Right Path

Jack Barricade has given me the #bMap of Phantom Forest#k that he took from Taggrin. He explained that he was forced to steal it from Taggrin, who had refused to give it to him even after he'd won it in a bet fair and square. Now that Jack's made it up to the Crimsonwood Mountain, he's given the map to me for my own use. Perhaps I should return it to Taggrin? If I keep it, the map will come in handy while navigating the tricky Phantom Forest, #ballowing me to use the marked shortcuts#k and save time traveling. But at the same time, there's a part of me that feels that this map still rightfully belongs to Taggrin. What should I do? It's a dilemma...

I told Taggrin that I'd found Jack up the Crimsonwood Mountain, and explained Jack's purpose. Taggrin was surprised when I offered to return his Map of Phantom Forest to him... and was moved by my gesture. He seems to have warmed up to me, and ask that I return and speak to him. What could he want?

In return for making the honorable gesture of returning his map, Taggrin let me in on a secret of his own: he and his band are not bandits at all, but are actually #bRaven Ninjas#k, descendants of the ancient #bShadowknights#k! They're here to discover what happened to their ancestral Keep and the reason behind the disappearance of Masteria. As such, Taggrin is offering a bounty on the Keep's unrightful occupiers. I can now speak to Joko to redeem any #rBadges#k I find off these corrupted warriors (the #rWindraiders#k, the #rStormbreakers#k, the #rFirebrands#k, and the #rNightshadowsRk) for #bmeso bounties#k, and possibly even #bRaven Ninja gear#k! I can make #bone Badge Bounty Redemption per day#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Fallen Warriors
I should speak to Taggrin to see if he has another task for me.

Taggrin has one more task for me: he wants me to hunt down the #bElder Wraiths#k and collect #b50 of their Elder Ashes#k. Warning me that this would be no easy task, he explained that the wraiths are the souls of brave Crimsonwood Keep warriors who fell in battle in the forest, protecting the Keep from the invading Krakians. Never given a proper burial, they have become mindless undead, threatening the Keep's foes and innocent travelers alike. With these ashes, Taggrin intends to give these noble lost souls the final rest they so rightfully deserve.

Taggrin was impressed that I manage to collect the ashes from the Elder Wraiths. I can now speak to #bFiona#k about #bupgrading any Raven Ninja gear#k I may have! Taggrin also mentioned that the talented ninja smith has experimented with some weapon designs of her own; I should speak to her about the possibility of #bcrafting new items#k from scratch.

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 1
I should see if Jack Barricade needs my help with anything...

Jack needs John's help, and needs me to be the go-between. He wants me to deliver a letter to his brother in NLC; the #bCoded Communique#k contains a transcription of some strange symbol code that he saw while being held in Crimsonwood Keep. Hopefully, with his expertise in ancient languages, John should be able to decipher it. I should hop to it! I have a feeling some serious events are unfolding...

Looks like Jack was right about the symbols he saw in the Grandmaster Council Hall; the Versalian code seems to indicate that the new Masters are planning to attack NLC with the soldiers they're training! It's going to be up to us to stop them!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 2
I should see if John needs my help with anything...

After showing John the #bCoded Communique#k that Jack gave me, John used a Hyper Glyph to try to decipher the symbols... to no avail. While John attempts to fix and recalibrate the Hyper Glyphs to work on these symbols, he asked me to show the letter around to the #bother experts in town#k. Maybe they can shine some light on all this...
I told John about Elpam's translation, and John was able to fill in some more of the blanks for me. I need to get this new information Jack and see what else he knows...

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 3

I showed the #bCoded Communique#k to Elpam Gorlab, and he recognized the symbols as being #bVersalian#k! Elpam translated what he could and gave me a #bTranslated Communique#k. I should show this to John immediately!
I must traverse Crimsonwood Mountain and get this new information Jack and see what else he knows...!
I reached Jack and gave him the info-he's going through it all now...

string.name: name
string.value: Stemming the Tide

The Versalian code that Jack uncovered and that Elpam translated points to some sort of imminent attack on New Leaf City by the Twisted Masters' army. It's up to us to stop them! I should talk to John...
Someone who has firsthand knowledge of the Keep. I think I have an idea who might be able to help.

I brought Lukan's #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k to Jack. I explained what Lukan told me: that this would unlock the gate mechanically, but the red energy field was a new development. Jack thinks he can figure out a solution for the magical barrier, but he'll need some time. I should check in with him later and see if he's made any progress.

string.name: name
string.value: 愚者的黄金

string.name: parent
string.value: 赏金猎人
在马斯特利亚和新叶城发生了这么多奇怪的事情，Lita Lawless肯定忙得不可开交！我敢打赌她一定乐意接受我的帮助……或许我还能借此赚些梅索！只需快速前往克尔宁市地铁站，我就能出发去新叶城！
我与Lita交谈过，她提到幻影森林里有个捣蛋鬼在游荡。这给她带来了不少麻烦——对于像她这样的战士来说，这实在让人感到惊讶。我已同意帮助她清除这些恶劣生物，作为证明，我需要带回#b30#k颗她所称的#b幸运符#k，这些奇怪的银苜蓿。我会提高警惕——据说那片森林闹鬼……
我深入疯狂的幻影森林，遇到了一些小妖精，并经过一番战斗后收集到了30颗幸运符。我将它们带回给Lita以领取赏金！她对我的帮助表示感谢，并提到我可以回来找她进行更多的赏金工作！

string.name: name
string.value: Fool's Gold.

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and it looks like there a trickster roaming about the Phantom Forest. It caused her quite a bit of trouble-surprising for a warrion of her caliber. I've agreed to help rid the Forest of these nefarious creatures, and as proof, I have to bring her#b 30 of the strange silver clovers#k-she called them #bLucky Charms#k. I'll be on guard-that forest is haunted...or so I've heard...

I ventured into the maddening Phantom Forest and came into contact with a number of the Leprechauns and after a series of battles, got 30 Lucky Charms. I returned them to Lita for the Bounty! She thanked me for my help, and mentioned that I can return to her for more bounty work!

string.name: name
string.value: Rags to Riches

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter.

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with LIta, and it seems that there strange, powerful spirits drifting about the Phantom Forest. These strange spirits seemingly have no desire, save for tormenting others. I've agreed to eliminate 30 of them, and bring their soiled rags to Lita as proof of valor. I'd better keep sharp-that forest has driven quite a few travelers mad with its confusion...

I navigated the Phantom Forest and collected 30 of the Soiled Rags the Elder Wraiths had upon them. It was strange to finally fight one, they were eerily quiet for being so vicious. I wonder if there's more to their story...perhaps someone in the Phantom Forest would know...

string.name: name
string.value: Rags to Riches.

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter.

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with LIta, and it seems that there strange, powerful spirits drifting about the Phantom Forest. These strange spirits seemingly have no desire, save for tormenting others. I've agreed to eliminate 30 of them, and bring their soiled rags to Lita as proof of valor. I'd better keep sharp-that forest has driven quite a few travelers mad with its confusion...

I navigated the Phantom Forest and collected 30 of the Soiled Rags the Elder Wraiths had upon them. It was strange to finally fight one, they were eerily quiet for being so vicious. I wonder if there's more to their story...perhaps someone in the Phantom Forest would know...

string.name: name
string.value: One Step A-Head

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter..

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and she told me the tragic origin of the Headless Horseman. He was a former warrior of Crimsonwood Keep that was experimented on the mysterious Alchemist, the same one who corrupted the Krakians. He now roams the Phantom Forest, and I must bring his Jack O'Lantern head to Lita as proof of my triumph!
It was a tough fight, but I brought down the mighty horseman and returned his Jack O'Lantern to Lita. I wonder how many other lives the mysterious Alchemist has ruined...

string.name: name
string.value: One Step A-Head.

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter..

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and she told me the tragic origin of the Headless Horseman. He was a former warrior of Crimsonwood Keep that was experimented on the mysterious Alchemist, the same one who corrupted the Krakians. He now roams the Phantom Forest, and I must bring his Jack O'Lantern head to Lita as proof of my triumph!
It was a tough fight, but I brought down the mighty horseman and returned his Jack O'Lantern to Lita. I wonder how many other lives the mysterious Alchemist has ruined...

string.name: name
string.value: Catch a Bigfoot by the Toe

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter...

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and I'm pretty sure I'm getting the short end of the stick on this one. I have to venture into the Phantom Forest and find this creature they've named Bigfoot and claim its toe as the proof of bounty. Everyone else who's gone after this thing has never come back-I'd better stock up on potions and keep my guard up-who knows when it could appear?

I found this mysterious creature, and Lita wasn't kidding when she said it wrecked everyone that came after it! Although, when I was fighting it, I got the feeling that the Leprechaun on its back was just luring him into things...maybe it just doesn't know better? At any rate, I returned the Toe to Lita and claimed the Bounty. The more mesos, the better!

string.name: name
string.value: Bounty Master

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter....
I've completed all Bounty Hunter bounties for Lita Lawless! I think its about time I'm deputized! I should head to New Leaf City and find out more!
I spoke with Lita, and she's all set to deputize me whenever I'm ready! Completing all those quests was hard, but well worth the effort!

I've been deputized by Lita Lawless as an official protector of New Leaf City! I've sworn to defend the area, and Masteria in general from all future threats...and from what it looks like, there's going to be a lot of them!

string.name: name
string.value: 出勤检查
所以如果我去找 #b#p9010000##k，我就能得到一份出勤表吗？我明白了……这是用来检查我对枫之故事的热情出勤。听起来很有趣……
#b#p9010000##k 告诉我，如果我把这份出勤表交给 #b#p9200000##k，那么我就可以获得花生酱和果冻三明治、巧克力牛奶、薯片、饼干和水果卷。如果我继续收集物品14天，那么在第15天，我可以得到一个特别奖品！显然，我必须每天回来领取奖品！
在成功检查我的出勤后，我得到了美味的午餐食材作为回报。我最好把从 #p9200000# 那里收到的这些物品放在安全的地方。\n#p9200000#告诉我，如果我在第15天把所有物品都给他，我还会得到一些不错的东西！

string.name: name
string.value: 出勤检查
我想知道如果我把这两周收集的物品给 #b#p9200000##k，他会给我什么。
我每天都来枫之故事，收集了所有美味的午餐食材。据我所知，这与我收集的五种小吃有关……
我把收集了14天的午餐小吃交给了 #b#p9200000##k。希望它们没有变质！总之，他似乎非常兴奋，并给了我一个可以当作武器使用的酷午餐盒。

string.name: name
string.value: Donate Your Notebook
I wonder what all the commotion is about. Rumor has it that there's a race going on. The team that collects the most Notebooks will win. The reward is also said to be very nice...
I'm really anxious to find out which team is winning. I gotta get more players involved to win this race!
I gave Maple Administrator the Notebook. She seemed very ecstatic, as if it was for him... seriously, what did she do with all those notebooks?

string.name: name
string.value: 冒险岛周末集市

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
冒险岛周末集市就是今天！
冒险岛周末集市会在明天举行！ 希望您多多参加～
冒险岛周末集市会在明天举行！

string.name: name
string.value: 冒险岛周末集市!

string.name: parent
string.value: 美代子，猫和雨珠子
冒险岛周末集市就是今天！
每周周日举办的冒险岛周末集市~ 冒险岛周末集市举办的日子。
冒险岛周末集市会在明天举行。

string.name: name
string.value: 帮助养鸡场主人的女儿烦斯乐。
在每周周日举办的冒险岛周末集市上，寻找养鸡场主人的女儿烦斯乐。
帮助烦斯乐在一周时间内照看鸡蛋的话，可以获得答谢。鸡蛋会在每次打猎的时候生长，打开UI的话效果会更好。并且必须每天给它喂成长所需的成长粉末才行。成长粉末会由冒险岛运营员每天分配。如果成功地养大成鸡的话，就在周六的时候去射手村见见烦斯乐。
成功帮助烦斯乐看守并孵化了鸡蛋！根据成功的次数，可以获得不错的报酬，你可以继续挑战。

string.name: name
string.value: 孵化鸡蛋的努力
要照看好烦斯乐的鸡蛋的话，有一件事必须要做。去见见冒险岛运营员吧。
从周一到周五必须每天去找冒险岛运营员，领取养鸡必须用到的成长粉末，然后涂在鸡蛋上。
获得了今天所需的成长粉末。快去涂到鸡蛋上吧。

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Spirits

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost Spirits
A new traveler is in the town of El Nath, I wonder what his story is...perhaps something to do with Zakum? I should pay him a visit; I heard his name is Adonis.
I visited El Nath, and found Adonis. He's speaking to me now...

Adonis and I had an enlightening conversation about Zakum, and the residents of the former town. It appears that Zakum gains additional power from what Adonis calls "Zakum Diamonds". They are souls of those who fell in battle against the mighty Zakum. As they were fellow warriors and adventurers like me, their souls must be released. If I can find a relic of the old town, such as a Crystal Blade, Miner's Hat, El Nathian Cape or Cloak of Corruption and combine it with a Zakum Diamond, I can perform a 'Liberation Ritual" that will free the soul by transferring their power into that item. I can then wear the enchanted item for extra strength in battle! Only thing is, Zakum Diamonds only come from one place, Zakum himself. This won't be easy...

string.value: Lost Spirits.

string.name: name
string.value: Dinner Fixins'
It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins'... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <CVS>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #bAllowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

string.name: name
string.value: Little Suzy's X-Mas Dilemma

There's a little girl with a puzzled look on her face in New Leaf City. With X-mas time just around the corner, she should be happy... I wonder why she looks so puzzled and confused instead? Looks like she may need some help with her Maplemas spirit!

Little Suzy was all excited for Maplemas this year... until she learned all about a similar holiday called "Versalmas" from a strange green mouse named O-Pongo. Now she doesn't know what sounds more exciting - Maplemas... or Versalmas? Suzy needs my help to help her decide which version of X-mas she should celebrate this year. In order to do that, I'll have to speak to both Maple Claws and this O-Pongo character, and then come back and talk to her. Maplemas holiday from an alternate dimension, huh? Very curious...

I spoke to both Maple Claws and O-Pongo. It seems that both Maplemas and Versalmas have their merits. In the end, Suzy's put the decision on me: she's asked me to deliver her X-mas Wishlist to one of the two "Santas," which will determine which holiday she's celebrating this year. I have a feeling that this decision is important, that I'm not just making a choice for her... but also one for myself. Which holiday do I believe in?

string.name: name
string.value: The Spirit of Maplemas
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to Maple Claws. I'm sure she's back in town now in Happyville.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to Maple Claws about Suzy's dilemma. Maple Claws listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Maple Claws gave me a message for Suzy: that as long as she remembers the essence of the Maplemas Spirit, it doesn't really matter what holiday traditions she chooses to follow this year. I should return to Suzy with Maple Claws' message once I've also spoken to O-Pongo.

string.name: name
string.value: A Versal Tradition
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to O-Pongo. I'd better speak with this strange green mouse and find out more details about Versalmas.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to O-Pongo about Suzy's dilemma. O-Pongo listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Versal Power! I spoke with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, who is the "Santa" for the Versal version of Maplemas, and learned a great deal about Versalmas. He told me about the customs for their holiday--quite different from the Maple World! The world of Versal is usually shrouded in darkness; Versalmas is an annual holiday that celebrates the emergence of the sun in their world, which shines for 90 straight days and only for these 90 days. For Versalmas, children receive presents every day for the first 30 days, and get cool treats like Sugar-coated Olives and Caramel Onions! Sounds pretty awesome... Now I'd better speak with Maple Claws and head back to Suzy... It makes me wonder for myself though, which holiday would I pick to celebrate? Hmmm...

string.name: name
string.value: A Very Merry Maplemas
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I'm thinking I should give it to Maple Claws; I should go see her in Happyville.

I can give Little Suzy's Wishlist to Maple Claws. In doing so, she'll be counting on me to help me recover her presents for her this year. All I have to do now is to give Maple Claws the list to cement my decision. Yes... it's going to be a very Merry Maplemas this year!

I thought that Maplemas was the better holiday so I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to Maple Claws. In return, she gave me a red #bMaplemas Hat#k that I can wear proudly to show my Maplemas Spirit! Every time I help Maple Claws recover the presents stolen by monsters, she'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents with her in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring her presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing Maple Claws more presents will also help me earn #bMaplemas Spirit#k! If the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k, Maple Claws will have a special something for me at the end of the event!a

string.name: name
string.value: Happy Versalmas to You
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I should go see O-Pongo in New Leaf City if I want to give it to him. Decisions, decisions...
I'm thinking it's Versalmas for me this year! All I have to do now to cement my decision is to actually give Little Suzy's Wishlist to O-Pongo. I can't wait! It's time for a change of pace!

Looks like I'm celebrating Versalmas this year! I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to O-Pongo, and he gave me this awesome #bVersalmas Hat#k for me to wear proudly! Every time I bring O-Pongo presents I've collected from monsters, he'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents to him in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring him presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing O-Pongo more presents will also help me earn #bVersalmas Cheer#k! If the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k, O-Pongo will have something really nice for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: A secret that Mr. Moneybags knows.
There's a legendary necklace called the "Mind of Maple" that everyone would like to have their hands on.......

There's a legendary necklace called the "Mind of Maple" that everyone would like to have their hands on... Once the Gate of Time opens, Mr. Moneybags will bring the blessing to everyone. Do you have the Mind of Maple? Only Mr. Moneybags knows the secret behind the necklace. Go visit Mr. Moneybags immediately.
Go ask Mr. Moneybags for more information about the Mind of Maple.

string.name: name
string.value: In search of the Mind of Maple

There's a legendary necklace called the #rMind of Maple#k that everyone would like to have their hands on....... Once the Gate of Time opens, #bMr. Moneybags#k will bring the blessing to everyone. Do you have the #rMind of Maple#k? Only #bMr. Moneybags#k knows the secret behind the necklace. Go visit #bMr. Moneybags immediately.

Gather up the items Mr. Moneybags asked you to get through #bChief Stan#k in order to restore the #rMind of Maple#k to its original state.

#t4032239:##r #c4032239#/1#k
#t4032233:##r #c4032233#/1#k
The #rMind of Maple#k has been restored to its original state. If you want one yourself, #bMr. Moneybags#k has mentioned that only the power of the guardian spirit may awaken the necklace.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Piece of Mind of Maple
#bChief Stan#k knows about your quest for the #rMind of Maple#k. He is awaiting your arrival, so go prove your worth to him.

Follow the instructions #bChief Stan#k, and defeat the monsters to gather up the appropriate items and prove him your worth.

#t4032234:##r #c4032234#/20#k
#t4032235:##r #c4032235#/20#k
#t4032236:##r #c4032236#/20#k
#t4032237:##r #c4032237#/20#k
#t4032238:##r #c4032238#/20#k
You have finally received an item of approval from Chief Stan. What does this have to do with restoring #rMind of Maple#k?

string.name: name
string.value: 神奇的鞭炮
在这辞旧迎新的时候，各村落有妖魔鬼怪出现，很恐怖。妖魔鬼怪最怕什么呢？东方有种神秘的力量作出来的东西-炮竹，听说炮竹震耳欲聋的声响可以除魔驱鬼。去上海南京路找财神看看吧。。。
过春节就要放鞭炮，放礼花。。。为什么？因为妖魔鬼魂最怕炮竹声。。。\r\n#t4001128# #b#c4001128##k/30
拿着炮竹去除妖驱鬼。响声越大力量就越大。。。除去妖魔鬼怪，新的一年才能平平安安。。。

string.name: name
string.value: 炮竹声声
得到了具有除魔驱鬼的鞭炮了，去各大村落放鞭炮去。。。
妖魔鬼怪在村落里横行，必需要靠近它放鞭炮，才能发挥神秘力量。一连鞭炮未能起作用，就要再去找财神，求他再做一连了。\n\n#o9500197# #r#a85701##k
爆竹声声除旧，新年快乐，万事如意。。。

string.name: name
string.value: 情比金坚之真心考验(1)
想要获得神秘宝物就得回答小蝶的问题。
请与你相爱的另一半，一同组队再来找我，等级需要25级以上才符合资格喔。

string.name: name
string.value: 情比金坚之真心考验(2)
想要获得神秘宝物就得回答小蝶的问题。
十里平湖霜满天，寸寸青丝愁华年，对月形单望相护，只羡鸳鸯不羡仙。这首定情诗怎么会考倒得了我，而且我也拿到小蝶的神秘礼物啰。

string.name: name
string.value: 2006 Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Green)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service...

#t2022066# #b#c2022066#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k with the #bEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #rEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Birthday Present (Red)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 1st birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bRED birthday present#k for me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031306# #b#c4031306#/1#k
I found the #bRED birthday present#k and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me, and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Cody's Quest
Cody is supposedly in need of help. I should go see him at Henesys...

Cody said he's preparing a big party for the MapleStory staff with food and everything, but he forgot to buy the birthday candles for the cake! He seemed to be in a state of emergency, and asked me if I could gather up #b10 Birthday Candles#k for him. #bBirthday Candles#k? That's weird...\n\n#t4031305# #b#c4031305#/10#k

I gave him the #b10 Birthday Candles#k he requested. He seemed very much relieved by the fact that the party won't be ruined after all. He gave me a #rMaple Flag#k as a reward. Wow, I haven't seen these in a while!

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Birthday Present (Blue)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 1st birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bBLUE Birthday Present #kfor me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031307# #b#c4031307#/1#k
I found the #bBLUE Birthday Present#k, and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Independence Day : Cody's Barbecue Party
Cody from Henesys is looking for my help. I hear that it is only for the limited time. Better go to Henesys and check out what he wants before time runs out!

Cody mentioned he is throwing a #rBarbecue party for Independence Day#k! He needs #b50 Pigs' Heads, 50 Tree Branches and 50 Leathers#k to prepare for the Barbecue. I wonder what leather has to do with a Barbecue...

#t4000017# #b#c4000017##k/50 
#t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/50 
#t4000021# #b#c4000021##k/50
I gave #bCody#k the materials needed for the Barbecue! I got some #bdelicious Barbecue#k and an #bIndependence Day Hat#k for a reward!

string.name: name
string.value: Independence Day : Alien Invasion
#bAgent Marco#k of the Omega Sector is looking for heroes to protect our World. I need to get to him before all hope is lost.

#bAgent Marco#k needs help on exterminating the #rPlateons#k on Boswell Fields. I heard that a tremendous number of Plateons are taking over the Boswell Fields and coming toward the Omega Sector. I need to take out bunch of Plateons and bring #b100 Plateon Helmets#k to Agent Marco of the Omega Sector as a proof of my mission's success.\n\n#t4000121# #b#c4000121##k/100
After I gave Agent Marco all #b100 Plateon Helmets#k, I received the #bStars and Stripes#k. This flag represents my support for the independence of our World.

string.name: name
string.value: Nanuke and the Chair
Nanuke apparently has something for everyone. He's way out there at the Whale Island. I should go see him...

Nanuke and his huskies greeted me with open arms. He proceeded to give me a resting chair as a way of celebrating the summer. Pretty ironic, considering he lives in perhaps the coldest place in MapleStory. Anyway, I should sit on this chair and relax for a bit...

string.name: name
string.value: 感恩节：收集黄色火鸡蛋
射手村的星缘搜寻火鸡蛋，他似乎需要帮助……

我现在的任务是为星缘找到尽可能多的#b黄色火鸡蛋#k ，这家伙对火鸡煎蛋卷情有独钟。我要尽力多找一些火鸡蛋，然后带给星缘，领取奖励！我听说金银岛周围就有驯化的火鸡。

#k
#t4031416# #c4031416# / #r1#k
任务结束了，我给星缘找到了#一些黄色火鸡蛋#k。他看起来非常开心，不过我觉得他吃了太多鸡蛋，自己都快变成火鸡了……哈哈！

string.name: name
string.value: 感恩节：收集绿色火鸡蛋
射手村的星缘搜寻火鸡蛋，他似乎需要帮助……

我现在的任务是为星缘找到尽可能多的#b绿色火鸡蛋#k ，这家伙对火鸡煎蛋卷情有独钟。我要尽力多找一些火鸡蛋，然后带给星缘，领取奖励！我听说神秘岛及林中之城周围就有驯化的火鸡。

#k
#t4031417# #c4031417# / #r1#k
任务结束了，我给星缘找到了一些鸡蛋。他看起来非常开心，不过我觉得他吃了太多鸡蛋，自己都快变成火鸡了……哈哈！

string.name: name
string.value: 感恩节：南瓜馅饼
射手村有位老妇人……她是不是需要有人帮他烹饪？

我与那位老妇人 - 本森老奶奶交谈过了，她需要有人帮他烹制馅饼。我答应帮她收集#b配料#k，也许她会让我带走一个馅饼呢……希望如此吧！

#t4031418# #c4031418# / #r1#k
#t4031419# #c4031419# / #r1#k#k
#t4031420# #c4031420# / #r1#k#k
#t4031421# #c4031421# / #r1#k
我帮本森老奶奶收集到了所需配料，她终于可以烹制馅饼了。作为回报，我吃到了美味的馅饼；在艰苦的战斗中这种食物能够维持我的体力。

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Blessing the Festival

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
I promised Hannah I'd return to her once I was rested up. I should head back soon.

Upon my return, Hannah was joyous, having finished the Altar. She now needs candles to signal the start of the ceremony. I'll have to get 9 candles (she mentioned Horned Mushrooms) and bring them back so the Festival of Lights can begin.
I acquired the nine candles and gave them to Hannah. The Festival of Lights has begun!

string.name: name
string.value: Graham Cracked
What is that old man doing over there with all those Graham Crackers?

I spoke with the old man, Mr. Kit Kat, and he wants to build a Graham Cracker house, but the monsters keep eating them...not that I blame them, they look delicious...despite my hunger, I've agreed to get 50 Graham Crackers for him so he can build his dream house.
I got all the Graham Cracker pieces (and resisted the temptation to eat them), returned to Mr. Kit Kat and he gave me something tasty?Banana Graham Pie. 2 of them!

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Wishes 1

string.name: parent
string.value: New Year : New Year's Wishes
Can't believe its New Year's already! Looks like the Maple Administrator has something for me!
Can't believe its New Year's already! Looks like the Maple Administrator has something for me!
The Maple Administrator opened my present for me! Sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : An Interesting Chore

string.name: parent
string.value: Spot On
Mom and Dad need some help at home. I'd better go visit and see how I can help them.
I visited Mom and Dad and they looked pretty happy to see me. They need a #bMouse#k for their new computer, and heard that Mr. Spot would have one. He's in Kerning City, so I'd better get a move on.
I returned to Mom and Dad with the #bMouse#k, and they gave me #bAllowance#k. Now I can return to Mr. Spot and get a #bNexon Prepaid!#k

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Wishes 2

string.name: parent
string.value: New Year : New Year's Wishes
It's New Year's! I should visit the Maple Administrator to get my present opened!
It's New Year's! I should visit the Maple Administrator to get my present opened!
The Maple Administrator opened my present for me! Sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Blessing the Festival reward

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Now that I have the Hanukkah Present Box, I'll need to get this opened to see what's inside. Better go talk to Hannah.
Hannah promised to open the box for me. The box seems heavy though, so I may get something nice in return...
Hannah helped open up the box, and I got to receive what's inside it. Not bad!

string.name: name
string.value: 阿莫里亚：樱花园 1

string.name: parent
string.value: 阿莫里亚：樱花园
我看到那边的花园管理员雅各布！他为什么看起来这么担心？也许我可以帮他一把。
我和雅各布谈过，他正在尝试扩展他的花园。他让我去收集#b25颗樱花种子#k、#b10根丝绸羽毛#k和#b10块皮革#k。我听说樱花独角兽可能有樱花种子。作为回报，他答应给我一些高质量的药水。我敢打赌它们尝起来很好喝……
我获得了雅各布所需的材料来扩展花园。他提到如果我需要的话，可能还会有更多工作给我。我很快会去拜访他！

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden 2 - Finishing Touches

string.name: parent
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden
Jacob mentioned he'd need more help. Perhaps I should pay him a visit?

I went to see Jacob again, and his Sakura Garden is just about done. He wants to do something special for the first guests, so I've agreed to provide #b20 White/Purple Gift Boxes#k, #b10 Lupin Dolls#k and #b10 Toy Baby Seals#k. Shouldn't be too tough, and he's mentioned something special if I finish...
I finished getting everything for Jacob and returned to him for my reward-#bBlossom Juice#k! It tastes great!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Beginner

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Beginner
The wife of a sailor, eh? I'll bet she needs some help.

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #b25 Stiff Feathers#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

string.name: name
string.value: 阿莫里亚：丘比特的信使 - 战士

string.name: parent
string.value: 丘比特的信使 - 战士
海员的妻子，哦？我敢打赌她需要一些帮助。
我和可爱的安吉莉克谈过了，我将为她送去#b15个粘性蜘蛛网#k给她的丈夫理查德。他在水路的泰公船上工作。一旦我搞定了一切，就会前往那里，将所有东西交给他，并告诉安吉莉克她的丈夫已经收到了所有东西。
我把材料送给了理查德，他对我表示感谢。他的妻子一定很高兴……

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Magician

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Magician
The wife of a sailor, eh? I'll bet she needs some help.

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #bLunar Pixie's Moonpiece#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #b20 Toy Ducklings#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Beginner

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Beginner
Okay, so now I gotta go see the sailor himself. Where must he be?
I delivered everything to Richard and he asked me delivered his letter to his wife.
I delivered everything to Richard and returned to Angelique. She gave me something nice, and I can go back to here anytime for a quick job.

string.name: name
string.value: 阿莫里亚：美丽还是野兽！
我听说在阿莫里亚发廊有一个漂亮女孩，她需要材料来制作新的发胶。我想知道她会提供什么作为回报？
我和克劳迪娅聊过，她需要#b25个绿液球#k来制作她的新发胶。她答应给我一张免费的经验发廊优惠券作为回报。看起来她是个不错的姑娘……
我为克劳迪娅准备了绿液球，她给了我一张她商店的经验发廊优惠券。我可以用它免费做一次头发！

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Marriage
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Warrior
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy, shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Circle of Trust 1 (The Unmarried Couple)

string.name: parent
string.value: Circle of Trust
An unhappy couple in Amoria? I should go find out what's wrong...
I spoke with Gary and Shatima, and it looks like their rings were broken and taken in to #b20 Ring Fragments#k by some Tweeters. Looks like I'll have to clip some wings to find them all...
I returned to the Rings to Gary and Shatima, and now they can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Circle of Trust 2 (A Bond is Forged)

string.name: parent
string.value: Circle of Trust
An unhappy couple in Amoria? I should go find out what's wrong...
I spoke with Gary and Shatima, and it looks like their rings were broken and taken in to #b20 Ring Fragments#k by some Tweeters. When I have them all, I am going to head over to Moony.
I returned to the Ring fragments to Moony, and now Gary and Shatima can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : An Interesting Chore

string.name: parent
string.value: Spot On
Mom and Dad need some help at home. I'd better go visit and see how I can help them.
I visited Mom and Dad and they looked pretty happy to see me. They need a #bMouse#k for their new computer, and heard that Mr. Spot would have one. He's in Kerning City, so I'd better get a move on.
I returned to Mom and Dad with the #bMouse#k, and they gave me #bAllowance#k. Now I can return to Mr. Spot and get a #bNexon Prepaid!#k

string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : Go See Mr. Spot

string.name: parent
string.value: Spot On
Mr. Spot is in Kerning City, and he has something that could help Mom and Dad. I'd better go see my parents first before I visit him.
I visited Mr. Spot and got the Mouse for Mom and Dad. I can get a #bNexon Prepaid#k from Mr. Spot if I ask them for #bAllowance#k. I'll cross my fingers...
I got my #bNexon Prepaid#k! I should keep it, because it will turn into Maple Points soon! SWEET!

string.name: name
string.value: Circle of Trust - Repaired Ring
I've lost the Ring I got from Moony on the way back to Gary and Shatima. Maybe Moony can help me out...
Moony has the Ring! I am saved. This time I should be very careful.
I got the Repaired Ring from Moony again, and now Gary and Shatima can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

string.name: name
string.value: Easter : Easter Basket
I better go check and see the Maple Administrator. She may have something in store for me...

The Maple Administrator needs #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k to make me an #rEaster Basket#k. I better go get those right now! 

#t4000003# #b#c4000003#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/100#k
I got the Easter Basket from the Maple Administrator. Mad Bunny may need this for something... I should go see him now.

string.name: name
string.value: Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Yellow)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service...

#t2022065# #b#c2022065#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k with the #rEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #bEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Green)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

#t2022066# #b#c2022066#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k with the #bEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #rEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 2nd birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bRED birthday present#k for me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031306# #b#c4031306#/1#k
I found the #bRED birthday present#k and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me, and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Anniversary : Cody's Quest
Cody is supposedly in need of help. I should go see him at Henesys...

Cody said he's preparing a big party for the MapleStory staff with food and everything, but he forgot to buy the birthday candles for the cake! He seemed to be in a state of emergency, and asked me if I could gather up #b10 Birthday Candles#k for him. #bBirthday Candles#k? That's weird...

I gave him the #b10 Birthday Candles#k he requested. He seemed very much relieved by the fact that the party won't be ruined after all. He gave me a #rMaple Flag#k as a reward. Wow, I haven't seen these in a while!

string.name: name
string.value: 关于阿莫里亚挑战！
智慧的艾梅斯给我带来了好消息。看起来他的兄弟强壮的阿莫斯已经完成了为已婚夫妇准备的狩猎场。我应该去拜访他，了解更多信息！
我拜访了智慧的艾梅斯，他详细解释了阿莫里亚派对任务。\n\n我需要前往紫木森林的尽头找强壮的阿莫斯，如果我#b结婚了，#k就可以进入这个狩猎场。我可以选择带上我的#b配偶，也可以独自前往#k。我必须与#b其他5位已婚人士#k组队，然后冒险就开始了！
这还不错！强壮的阿莫斯与他的兄弟艾梅斯截然不同——他的肌肉多得仿佛是又生出了一层！要进入他的狩猎场，我必须结婚，并且可以带上我的配偶或者和其他5位已婚人士一起去。我应该更常来阿莫里亚……我想知道这个地方还有哪些奇妙的东西……

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ - Start
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!

I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to bring 10 #b#t4031664#s#k 10 #b#t4031665#s#k and 10 #b#t4031666##k to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: 暑假：科迪的烧烤...
万岁，夏天！我听说科迪要举办烧烤聚会！我得赶快过去看看能不能帮忙！
我和科迪谈过了，看起来他需要帮助。我需要找到30个 #b#t4031660##k 并带回来给科迪，这样他才能完成烹饪。光是想到这些就让我觉得饿了！
我找到了科迪所需的所有食材，可以开始烧烤了！有了他给我的物品，我可以继续以优雅的方式享受这个夏天！

string.name: name
string.value: 打开恶魔文件
想打开恶魔文件的话去找玩具城的基尼怎么样?
基尼要回恶魔文件说要解读,同时给了一件很珍贵的物品,宝箱.为了打开这个宝箱需要一个可以打开该宝箱的钥匙... 打倒#b#o2230103##k就可以获得能开启宝箱的钥匙.
向基尼邀请解读恶魔文件,并获得了宝箱. 用钥匙打开宝箱获了了意想不到的礼物.

string.name: name
string.value: 特奥的回想
听说明珠港的特奥会帮助我.

在明珠港见到了特奥。他看到我就想起他年轻的时候。所以他愿意帮我。要我收集#b50个#t4000016##k和#b30个#t4000004##k给他。他会支持我。。。收集这些物品对我来说没问题！

#t4000016# #c4000016#/50

#t4000004# #c4000004#/30
我去明珠港见特奥证明了我的素质。特奥承认了我的能力给了我资金。我以后一定会成为优秀的冒险者！

string.name: name
string.value: 制作新年饺子
听说搜集粉嫩饺子面粉、活力鲜肉和恬静白菜交给冒险岛运营员，他就会为你制作节日喜气饺子。
搜集节日喜气饺子的材料粉嫩饺子面粉、活力鲜肉和恬静白菜，制作了节日喜气饺子。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作春节黄金饺子王
听说用10个节日喜气饺子可以换1个黄金饺子王？黄金饺子王……应该是很不错的东西吧……
冒险岛运营员说拿10个节日喜气饺子过去，就可以交换到黄金饺子王。\n\n#t2022672:# #b#c2022672#/10#k
用10个节日喜气饺子交换到了黄金饺子王。

string.name: name
string.value: 和星缘共度新春佳节
听说有人非常想吃黄金饺子王，会是谁呢？
听说星缘正在找好吃的黄金饺子王。星缘想要黄金饺子王？到底是为什么呢？带着黄金饺子王去见见星缘吧。
星缘说自己正在研究春节的食物，因此正在寻找黄金饺子王。在研究结束之前，会一直需要黄金饺子王。得到黄金饺子王之后，就拿去交给她吧。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作节日春卷
听说搜集益寿春卷皮、福气肉馅和财运豆油交给冒险岛运营员，可以制作节日恭喜春卷。
搜集到了制作节日恭喜春卷的材料。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作春节福禄寿春卷拼盘
搜集节日恭喜春卷，制作福禄寿春卷拼盘怎么样？应该最适合用来送礼了。
搜集到20个春卷后找到运营员，他说会为我精心制作福禄寿春卷拼盘……\n\n#k#t2022673:# #b#c2022673#/20#k
搜集到20个春卷之后，运营员为我精心制作了福禄寿春卷拼盘。

星缘说自己正在研究春节的食物，因此正在寻找福禄寿春卷拼盘。在研究结束之前，会一直需要福禄寿春卷拼盘。得到福禄寿春卷拼盘之后，就拿去交给她吧。

冒险岛运营员说搜集缠绵糯米、蜜语糖精和配对年糕锤交给他，他就能为我制作节日浓情年糕。
冒险岛运营员说会用缠绵糯米、蜜语糖精和配对年糕锤制作出美味的节日浓情年糕。

string.name: name
string.value: 制作缠缠绵绵年糕盒
搜集30个节日浓情年糕，制作缠缠绵绵年糕盒吧。
冒险岛运营员说如果我能给他30个节日浓情年糕，他就会为我打包，做出漂亮的缠缠绵绵年糕盒。\n\n#k#i2022674##t2022674# #b#c2022674#/30#k
搜集30个节日浓情年糕，制作出了好看又好吃的缠缠绵绵年糕盒。
